Verse Translation: And for all there are degrees [of reward and punishment] for what they have done, and [it is] so that He may fully compensate them for their deeds, and they will not be wronged.

Verse Text: وَيَوْمَ يُعْرَضُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا عَلَى النَّارِ أَذْهَبْتُمْ طَيِّبَاتِكُمْ فِي حَيَاتِكُمُ الدُّنْيَا وَاسْتَمْتَعْتُمْ بِهَا فَالْيَوْمَ تُجْزَوْنَ عَذَابَ الْهُونِ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَسْتَكْبِرُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ بِغَيْرِ الْحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَفْسُقُونَ
Verse Translation: And the Day those who disbelieved are exposed to the Fire [it will be said], "You exhausted your pleasures during your worldly life and enjoyed them, so this Day you will be awarded the punishment of [extreme] humiliation because you were arrogant upon the earth without right and because you were defiantly disobedient."

Verse Text: وَاذْكُرْ أَخَا عَادٍ إِذْ أَنْذَرَ قَوْمَهُ بِالْأَحْقَافِ وَقَدْ خَلَتِ النُّذُرُ مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِ أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوا إِلَّا اللَّهَ إِنِّي أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
Verse Translation: And mention, [O Muhammad], the brother of 'Aad, when he warned his people in the [region of] al-Ahqaf - and warners had already passed on before him and after him - [saying], "Do not worship except Allah. Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."

Verse Text: قَالُوا أَجِئْتَنَا لِتَأْفِكَنَا عَنْ آلِهَتِنَا فَأْتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَا إِنْ كُنْتَ مِنَ الصَّادِقِينَ
Verse Translation: They said, "Have you come to delude us away from our gods? Then bring us what you promise us, if you should be of the truthful."

Verse Text: قَالَ إِنَّمَا الْعِلْمُ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ وَأُبَلِّغُكُمْ مَا أُرْسِلْتُ بِهِ وَلَكِنِّي أَرَاكُمْ قَوْمًا تَجْهَلُونَ
Verse Translation: He said, "Knowledge [of its time] is only with Allah, and I convey to you that with which I was sent; but I see you [to be] a people behaving ignorantly."

Verse Text: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ عَارِضًا مُسْتَقْبِلَ أَوْدِيَتِهِمْ قَالُوا هَذَا عَارِضٌ مُمْطِرُنَا بَلْ هُوَ مَا اسْتَعْجَلْتُمْ بِهِ رِيحٌ فِيهَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
Verse Translation: And when they saw it as a cloud approaching their valleys, they said, "This is a cloud bringing us rain!" Rather, it is that for which you were impatient: a wind, within it a painful punishment,

Verse Text: تُدَمِّرُ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ بِأَمْرِ رَبِّهَا فَأَصْبَحُوا لَا يُرَى إِلَّا مَسَاكِنُهُمْ كَذَلِكَ نَجْزِي الْقَوْمَ الْمُجْرِمِينَ
Verse Translation: Destroying everything by command of its Lord. And they became so that nothing was seen [of them] except their dwellings. Thus do We recompense the criminal people.

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ مَكَّنَّاهُمْ فِيمَا إِنْ مَكَّنَّاكُمْ فِيهِ وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُمْ سَمْعًا وَأَبْصَارًا وَأَفْئِدَةً فَمَا أَغْنَى عَنْهُمْ سَمْعُهُمْ وَلَا أَبْصَارُهُمْ وَلَا أَفْئِدَتُهُمْ مِنْ شَيْءٍ إِذْ كَانُوا يَجْحَدُونَ بِآيَاتِ اللَّهِ وَحَاقَ بِهِمْ مَا كَانُوا بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِئُونَ
Verse Translation: And We had certainly established them in such as We have not established you, and We made for them hearing and vision and hearts. But their hearing and vision and hearts availed them not from anything [of the punishment] when they were [continually] rejecting the signs of Allah; and they were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَا مَا حَوْلَكُمْ مِنَ الْقُرَى وَصَرَّفْنَا الْآيَاتِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
Verse Translation: And We have already destroyed what surrounds you of [those] cities, and We have diversified the signs [or verses] that perhaps they might return [from disbelief].

Verse Text: فَلَوْلَا نَصَرَهُمُ الَّذِينَ اتَّخَذُوا مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ قُرْبَانًا آلِهَةً بَلْ ضَلُّوا عَنْهُمْ وَذَلِكَ إِفْكُهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا يَفْتَرُونَ
Verse Translation: Then why did those they took besides Allah as deities by which to approach [Him] not aid them? But they had strayed from them. And that was their falsehood and what they were inventing.

Verse Text: وَإِذْ صَرَفْنَا إِلَيْكَ نَفَرًا مِنَ الْجِنِّ يَسْتَمِعُونَ الْقُرْآنَ فَلَمَّا حَضَرُوهُ قَالُوا أَنْصِتُوا فَلَمَّا قُضِيَ وَلَّوْا إِلَى قَوْمِهِمْ مُنْذِرِينَ
Verse Translation: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We directed to you a few of the jinn, listening to the Qur'an. And when they attended it, they said, "Listen quietly." And when it was concluded, they went back to their people as warners.

Verse Text: قَالُوا يَا قَوْمَنَا إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا كِتَابًا أُنْزِلَ مِنْ بَعْدِ مُوسَى مُصَدِّقًا لِمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ يَهْدِي إِلَى الْحَقِّ وَإِلَى طَرِيقٍ مُسْتَقِيمٍ
Verse Translation: They said, "O our people, indeed we have heard a [recited] Book revealed after Moses confirming what was before it which guides to the truth and to a straight path.

Verse Text: يَا قَوْمَنَا أَجِيبُوا دَاعِيَ اللَّهِ وَآمِنُوا بِهِ يَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ مِنْ ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُجِرْكُمْ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
Verse Translation: O our people, respond to the Messenger of Allah and believe in him; Allah will forgive for you your sins and protect you from a painful punishment.

Verse Text: وَمَنْ لَا يُجِبْ دَاعِيَ اللَّهِ فَلَيْسَ بِمُعْجِزٍ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَيْسَ لَهُ مِنْ دُونِهِ أَوْلِيَاءُ أُولَئِكَ فِي ضَلَالٍ مُبِينٍ
Verse Translation: But he who does not respond to the Caller of Allah will not cause failure [to Him] upon earth, and he will not have besides Him any protectors. Those are in manifest error."

Verse Text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا أَنَّ اللَّهَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَلَمْ يَعْيَ بِخَلْقِهِنَّ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَى أَنْ يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَى بَلَى إِنَّهُ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
Verse Translation: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and earth and did not fail in their creation, is able to give life to the dead? Yes. Indeed, He is over all things competent.

Verse Text: وَيَوْمَ يُعْرَضُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا عَلَى النَّارِ أَلَيْسَ هَذَا بِالْحَقِّ قَالُوا بَلَى وَرَبِّنَا قَالَ فَذُوقُوا الْعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
Verse Translation: And the Day those who disbelieved are exposed to the Fire [it will be said], "Is this not the truth?" They will say, "Yes, by our Lord." He will say, "Then taste the punishment because you used to disbelieve."

Verse Text: فَاصْبِرْ كَمَا صَبَرَ أُولُو الْعَزْمِ مِنَ الرُّسُلِ وَلَا تَسْتَعْجِلْ لَهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَ مَا يُوعَدُونَ لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا سَاعَةً مِنْ نَهَارٍ بَلَاغٌ فَهَلْ يُهْلَكُ إِلَّا الْقَوْمُ الْفَاسِقُونَ
Verse Translation: So be patient, [O Muhammad], as were those of determination among the messengers and do not be impatient for them. It will be - on the Day they see that which they are promised - as though they had not remained [in the world] except an hour of a day. [This is] notification. And will [any] be destroyed except the defiantly disobedient people?

Verse Text: الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوا عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
Verse Translation: Those who disbelieve and avert [people] from the way of Allah - He will waste their deeds.

Verse Text: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَآمَنُوا بِمَا نُزِّلَ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَهُوَ الْحَقُّ مِنْ رَبِّهِمْ كَفَّرَ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّئَاتِهِمْ وَأَصْلَحَ بَالَهُمْ
Verse Translation: And those who believe and do righteous deeds and believe in what has been sent down upon Muhammad - and it is the truth from their Lord - He will remove from them their misdeeds and amend their condition.

Verse Text: ذَلِكَ بِأَنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا اتَّبَعُوا الْبَاطِلَ وَأَنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّبَعُوا الْحَقَّ مِنْ رَبِّهِمْ كَذَلِكَ يَضْرِبُ اللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ أَمْثَالَهُمْ
Verse Translation: That is because those who disbelieve follow falsehood, and those who believe follow the truth from their Lord. Thus does Allah present to the people their comparisons.

Verse Text: فَإِذَا لَقِيتُمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فَضَرْبَ الرِّقَابِ حَتَّى إِذَا أَثْخَنْتُمُوهُمْ فَشُدُّوا الْوَثَاقَ فَإِمَّا مَنًّا بَعْدُ وَإِمَّا فِدَاءً حَتَّى تَضَعَ الْحَرْبُ أَوْزَارَهَا ذَلِكَ وَلَوْ يَشَاءُ اللَّهُ لَانْتَصَرَ مِنْهُمْ وَلَكِنْ لِيَبْلُوَ بَعْضَكُمْ بِبَعْضٍ وَالَّذِينَ قُتِلُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ فَلَنْ يُضِلَّ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
Verse Translation: So when you meet those who disbelieve [in battle], strike [their] necks until, when you have inflicted slaughter upon them, then secure their bonds, and either [confer] favor afterwards or ransom [them] until the war lays down its burdens. That [is the command]. And if Allah had willed, He could have taken vengeance upon them [Himself], but [He ordered armed struggle] to test some of you by means of others. And those who are killed in the cause of Allah - never will He waste their deeds.

Verse Text: سَيَهْدِيهِمْ وَيُصْلِحُ بَالَهُمْ
Verse Translation: He will guide them and amend their condition

Verse Text: وَيُدْخِلُهُمُ الْجَنَّةَ عَرَّفَهَا لَهُمْ
Verse Translation: And admit them to Paradise, which He has made known to them.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِنْ تَنْصُرُوا اللَّهَ يَنْصُرْكُمْ وَيُثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَكُمْ
Verse Translation: O you who have believed, if you support Allah, He will support you and plant firmly your feet.

Verse Text: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فَتَعْسًا لَهُمْ وَأَضَلَّ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
Verse Translation: But those who disbelieve - for them is misery, and He will waste their deeds.

Verse Text: ذَلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَرِهُوا مَا أَنْزَلَ اللَّهُ فَأَحْبَطَ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
Verse Translation: That is because they disliked what Allah revealed, so He rendered worthless their deeds.

Verse Text: أَفَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ فَيَنْظُرُوا كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ دَمَّرَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلِلْكَافِرِينَ أَمْثَالُهَا
Verse Translation: Have they not traveled through the land and seen how was the end of those before them? Allah destroyed [everything] over them, and for the disbelievers is something comparable.

Verse Text: ذَلِكَ بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ مَوْلَى الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَأَنَّ الْكَافِرِينَ لَا مَوْلَى لَهُمْ
Verse Translation: That is because Allah is the protector of those who have believed and because the disbelievers have no protector.

Verse Text: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُدْخِلُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يَتَمَتَّعُونَ وَيَأْكُلُونَ كَمَا تَأْكُلُ الْأَنْعَامُ وَالنَّارُ مَثْوًى لَهُمْ
Verse Translation: Indeed, Allah will admit those who have believed and done righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow, but those who disbelieve enjoy themselves and eat as grazing livestock eat, and the Fire will be a residence for them.

Verse Text: وَكَأَيِّنْ مِنْ قَرْيَةٍ هِيَ أَشَدُّ قُوَّةً مِنْ قَرْيَتِكَ الَّتِي أَخْرَجَتْكَ أَهْلَكْنَاهُمْ فَلَا نَاصِرَ لَهُمْ
Verse Translation: And how many a city was stronger than your city [Makkah] which drove you out? We destroyed them; and there was no helper for them.

Verse Text: أَفَمَنْ كَانَ عَلَى بَيِّنَةٍ مِنْ رَبِّهِ كَمَنْ زُيِّنَ لَهُ سُوءُ عَمَلِهِ وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ
Verse Translation: So is he who is on clear evidence from his Lord like him to whom the evil of his work has been made attractive and they follow their [own] desires?

Verse Text: مَثَلُ الْجَنَّةِ الَّتِي وُعِدَ الْمُتَّقُونَ فِيهَا أَنْهَارٌ مِنْ مَاءٍ غَيْرِ آسِنٍ وَأَنْهَارٌ مِنْ لَبَنٍ لَمْ يَتَغَيَّرْ طَعْمُهُ وَأَنْهَارٌ مِنْ خَمْرٍ لَذَّةٍ لِلشَّارِبِينَ وَأَنْهَارٌ مِنْ عَسَلٍ مُصَفًّى وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مِنْ كُلِّ الثَّمَرَاتِ وَمَغْفِرَةٌ مِنْ رَبِّهِمْ كَمَنْ هُوَ خَالِدٌ فِي النَّارِ وَسُقُوا مَاءً حَمِيمًا فَقَطَّعَ أَمْعَاءَهُمْ
Verse Translation: Is the description of Paradise, which the righteous are promised, wherein are rivers of water unaltered, rivers of milk the taste of which never changes, rivers of wine delicious to those who drink, and rivers of purified honey, in which they will have from all [kinds of] fruits and forgiveness from their Lord, like [that of] those who abide eternally in the Fire and are given to drink scalding water that will sever their intestines?

Verse Text: وَمِنْهُمْ مَنْ يَسْتَمِعُ إِلَيْكَ حَتَّى إِذَا خَرَجُوا مِنْ عِنْدِكَ قَالُوا لِلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْعِلْمَ مَاذَا قَالَ آنِفًا أُولَئِكَ الَّذِينَ طَبَعَ اللَّهُ عَلَى قُلُوبِهِمْ وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ
Verse Translation: And among them, [O Muhammad], are those who listen to you, until when they depart from you, they say to those who were given knowledge, "What has he said just now?" Those are the ones of whom Allah has sealed over their hearts and who have followed their [own] desires.

Verse Text: وَالَّذِينَ اهْتَدَوْا زَادَهُمْ هُدًى وَآتَاهُمْ تَقْوَاهُمْ
Verse Translation: And those who are guided - He increases them in guidance and gives them their righteousness.

Verse Text: فَهَلْ يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَّا السَّاعَةَ أَنْ تَأْتِيَهُمْ بَغْتَةً فَقَدْ جَاءَ أَشْرَاطُهَا فَأَنَّى لَهُمْ إِذَا جَاءَتْهُمْ ذِكْرَاهُمْ
Verse Translation: Then do they await except that the Hour should come upon them unexpectedly? But already there have come [some of] its indications. Then what good to them, when it has come, will be their remembrance?

Verse Text: فَاعْلَمْ أَنَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَاسْتَغْفِرْ لِذَنْبِكَ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُمْ وَمَثْوَاكُمْ
Verse Translation: So know, [O Muhammad], that there is no deity except Allah and ask forgiveness for your sin and for the believing men and believing women. And Allah knows of your movement and your resting place.

Verse Text: وَيَقُولُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَوْلَا نُزِّلَتْ سُورَةٌ فَإِذَا أُنْزِلَتْ سُورَةٌ مُحْكَمَةٌ وَذُكِرَ فِيهَا الْقِتَالُ رَأَيْتَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ مَرَضٌ يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَيْكَ نَظَرَ الْمَغْشِيِّ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ الْمَوْتِ فَأَوْلَى لَهُمْ
Verse Translation: Those who believe say, "Why has a surah not been sent down? But when a precise surah is revealed and fighting is mentioned therein, you see those in whose hearts is hypocrisy looking at you with a look of one overcome by death. And more appropriate for them [would have been]

Verse Text: طَاعَةٌ وَقَوْلٌ مَعْرُوفٌ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ الْأَمْرُ فَلَوْ صَدَقُوا اللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَهُمْ
Verse Translation: Obedience and good words. And when the matter [of fighting] was determined, if they had been true to Allah, it would have been better for them.

Verse Text: فَهَلْ عَسَيْتُمْ إِنْ تَوَلَّيْتُمْ أَنْ تُفْسِدُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوا أَرْحَامَكُمْ
Verse Translation: So would you perhaps, if you turned away, cause corruption on earth and sever your [ties of] relationship?

Verse Text: أُولَئِكَ الَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ اللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمْ وَأَعْمَى أَبْصَارَهُمْ
Verse Translation: Those [who do so] are the ones that Allah has cursed, so He deafened them and blinded their vision.

Verse Text: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ الْقُرْآنَ أَمْ عَلَى قُلُوبٍ أَقْفَالُهَا
Verse Translation: Then do they not reflect upon the Qur'an, or are there locks upon [their] hearts?

Verse Text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ ارْتَدُّوا عَلَى أَدْبَارِهِمْ مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الْهُدَى الشَّيْطَانُ سَوَّلَ لَهُمْ وَأَمْلَى لَهُمْ
Verse Translation: Indeed, those who reverted back [to disbelief] after guidance had become clear to them - Satan enticed them and prolonged hope for them.

Verse Text: ذَلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُوا مَا نَزَّلَ اللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمْ فِي بَعْضِ الْأَمْرِ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ إِسْرَارَهُمْ
Verse Translation: That is because they said to those who disliked what Allah sent down, "We will obey you in part of the matter." And Allah knows what they conceal.

Verse Text: فَكَيْفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتْهُمُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ يَضْرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمْ وَأَدْبَارَهُمْ
Verse Translation: Then how [will it be] when the angels take them in death, striking their faces and their backs?

Verse Text: ذَلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ اتَّبَعُوا مَا أَسْخَطَ اللَّهَ وَكَرِهُوا رِضْوَانَهُ فَأَحْبَطَ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
Verse Translation: That is because they followed what angered Allah and disliked [what earns] His pleasure, so He rendered worthless their deeds.

Verse Text: أَمْ حَسِبَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ مَرَضٌ أَنْ لَنْ يُخْرِجَ اللَّهُ أَضْغَانَهُمْ
Verse Translation: Or do those in whose hearts is disease think that Allah would never expose their [feelings of] hatred?

Verse Text: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَأَرَيْنَاكَهُمْ فَلَعَرَفْتَهُمْ بِسِيمَاهُمْ وَلَتَعْرِفَنَّهُمْ فِي لَحْنِ الْقَوْلِ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ أَعْمَالَكُمْ
Verse Translation: And if We willed, We could show them to you, and you would know them by their mark; but you will surely know them by the tone of [their] speech. And Allah knows your deeds.

Verse Text: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ حَتَّى نَعْلَمَ الْمُجَاهِدِينَ مِنْكُمْ وَالصَّابِرِينَ وَنَبْلُوَ أَخْبَارَكُمْ
Verse Translation: And We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you [for the cause of Allah] and the patient, and We will test your affairs.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوا عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَشَاقُّوا الرَّسُولَ مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الْهُدَى لَنْ يَضُرُّوا اللَّهَ شَيْئًا وَسَيُحْبِطُ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
Verse Translation: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and opposed the Messenger after guidance had become clear to them - never will they harm Allah at all, and He will render worthless their deeds.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا الرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبْطِلُوا أَعْمَالَكُمْ
Verse Translation: O you who have believed, obey Allah and obey the Messenger and do not invalidate your deeds.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوا عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ثُمَّ مَاتُوا وَهُمْ كُفَّارٌ فَلَنْ يَغْفِرَ اللَّهُ لَهُمْ
Verse Translation: Indeed, those who disbelieved and averted [people] from the path of Allah and then died while they were disbelievers - never will Allah forgive them.

Verse Text: فَلَا تَهِنُوا وَتَدْعُوا إِلَى السَّلْمِ وَأَنْتُمُ الْأَعْلَوْنَ وَاللَّهُ مَعَكُمْ وَلَنْ يَتِرَكُمْ أَعْمَالَكُمْ
Verse Translation: So do not weaken and call for peace while you are superior; and Allah is with you and will never deprive you of [the reward of] your deeds.

Verse Text: إِنَّمَا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌ وَلَهْوٌ وَإِنْ تُؤْمِنُوا وَتَتَّقُوا يُؤْتِكُمْ أُجُورَكُمْ وَلَا يَسْأَلْكُمْ أَمْوَالَكُمْ
Verse Translation: [This] worldly life is only amusement and diversion. And if you believe and fear Allah, He will give you your rewards and not ask you for your properties.

Verse Text: إِنْ يَسْأَلْكُمُوهَا فَيُحْفِكُمْ تَبْخَلُوا وَيُخْرِجْ أَضْغَانَكُمْ
Verse Translation: If He should ask you for them and press you, you would withhold, and He would expose your unwillingness.

Verse Text: هَا أَنْتُمْ هَؤُلَاءِ تُدْعَوْنَ لِتُنْفِقُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ فَمِنْكُمْ مَنْ يَبْخَلُ وَمَنْ يَبْخَلْ فَإِنَّمَا يَبْخَلُ عَنْ نَفْسِهِ وَاللَّهُ الْغَنِيُّ وَأَنْتُمُ الْفُقَرَاءُ وَإِنْ تَتَوَلَّوْا يَسْتَبْدِلْ قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوا أَمْثَالَكُمْ
Verse Translation: Here you are - those invited to spend in the cause of Allah - but among you are those who withhold [out of greed]. And whoever withholds only withholds [benefit] from himself; and Allah is the Free of need, while you are the needy. And if you turn away, He will replace you with another people; then they will not be the likes of you.

Verse Text: إِنَّا فَتَحْنَا لَكَ فَتْحًا مُبِينًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, We have given you, [O Muhammad], a clear conquest

Verse Text: لِيَغْفِرَ لَكَ اللَّهُ مَا تَقَدَّمَ مِنْ ذَنْبِكَ وَمَا تَأَخَّرَ وَيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُ عَلَيْكَ وَيَهْدِيَكَ صِرَاطًا مُسْتَقِيمًا
Verse Translation: That Allah may forgive for you what preceded of your sin and what will follow and complete His favor upon you and guide you to a straight path

Verse Text: وَيَنْصُرَكَ اللَّهُ نَصْرًا عَزِيزًا
Verse Translation: And [that] Allah may aid you with a mighty victory.

Verse Text: هُوَ الَّذِي أَنْزَلَ السَّكِينَةَ فِي قُلُوبِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ لِيَزْدَادُوا إِيمَانًا مَعَ إِيمَانِهِمْ وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
Verse Translation: It is He who sent down tranquillity into the hearts of the believers that they would increase in faith along with their [present] faith. And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth, and ever is Allah Knowing and Wise.

Verse Text: لِيُدْخِلَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا وَيُكَفِّرَ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّئَاتِهِمْ وَكَانَ ذَلِكَ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ فَوْزًا عَظِيمًا
Verse Translation: [And] that He may admit the believing men and the believing women to gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein eternally and remove from them their misdeeds - and ever is that, in the sight of Allah, a great attainment -

Verse Text: وَيُعَذِّبَ الْمُنَافِقِينَ وَالْمُنَافِقَاتِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ وَالْمُشْرِكَاتِ الظَّانِّينَ بِاللَّهِ ظَنَّ السَّوْءِ عَلَيْهِمْ دَائِرَةُ السَّوْءِ وَغَضِبَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَعَنَهُمْ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ جَهَنَّمَ وَسَاءَتْ مَصِيرًا
Verse Translation: And [that] He may punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women, and the polytheist men and polytheist women - those who assume about Allah an assumption of evil nature. Upon them is a misfortune of evil nature; and Allah has become angry with them and has cursed them and prepared for them Hell, and evil it is as a destination.

Verse Text: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
Verse Translation: And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.

Verse Text: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ شَاهِدًا وَمُبَشِّرًا وَنَذِيرًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner

Verse Text: لِتُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُ وَتُسَبِّحُوهُ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
Verse Translation: That you [people] may believe in Allah and His Messenger and honor him and respect the Prophet and exalt Allah morning and afternoon.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُبَايِعُونَكَ إِنَّمَا يُبَايِعُونَ اللَّهَ يَدُ اللَّهِ فَوْقَ أَيْدِيهِمْ فَمَنْ نَكَثَ فَإِنَّمَا يَنْكُثُ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ وَمَنْ أَوْفَى بِمَا عَاهَدَ عَلَيْهُ اللَّهَ فَسَيُؤْتِيهِ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, those who pledge allegiance to you, [O Muhammad] - they are actually pledging allegiance to Allah. The hand of Allah is over their hands. So he who breaks his word only breaks it to the detriment of himself. And he who fulfills that which he has promised Allah - He will give him a great reward.

Verse Text: سَيَقُولُ لَكَ الْمُخَلَّفُونَ مِنَ الْأَعْرَابِ شَغَلَتْنَا أَمْوَالُنَا وَأَهْلُونَا فَاسْتَغْفِرْ لَنَا يَقُولُونَ بِأَلْسِنَتِهِمْ مَا لَيْسَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ قُلْ فَمَنْ يَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ مِنَ اللَّهِ شَيْئًا إِنْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ ضَرًّا أَوْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ نَفْعًا بَلْ كَانَ اللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًا
Verse Translation: Those who remained behind of the bedouins will say to you, "Our properties and our families occupied us, so ask forgiveness for us." They say with their tongues what is not within their hearts. Say, "Then who could prevent Allah at all if He intended for you harm or intended for you benefit? Rather, ever is Allah, with what you do, Acquainted.

Verse Text: بَلْ ظَنَنْتُمْ أَنْ لَنْ يَنْقَلِبَ الرَّسُولُ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَى أَهْلِيهِمْ أَبَدًا وَزُيِّنَ ذَلِكَ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ وَظَنَنْتُمْ ظَنَّ السَّوْءِ وَكُنْتُمْ قَوْمًا بُورًا
Verse Translation: But you thought that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families, ever, and that was made pleasing in your hearts. And you assumed an assumption of evil and became a people ruined."

Verse Text: وَمَنْ لَمْ يُؤْمِنْ بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ فَإِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَعِيرًا
Verse Translation: And whoever has not believed in Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers a Blaze.

Verse Text: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ يَغْفِرُ لِمَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَحِيمًا
Verse Translation: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

Verse Text: سَيَقُولُ الْمُخَلَّفُونَ إِذَا انْطَلَقْتُمْ إِلَى مَغَانِمَ لِتَأْخُذُوهَا ذَرُونَا نَتَّبِعْكُمْ يُرِيدُونَ أَنْ يُبَدِّلُوا كَلَامَ اللَّهِ قُلْ لَنْ تَتَّبِعُونَا كَذَلِكُمْ قَالَ اللَّهُ مِنْ قَبْلُ فَسَيَقُولُونَ بَلْ تَحْسُدُونَنَا بَلْ كَانُوا لَا يَفْقَهُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
Verse Translation: Those who remained behind will say when you set out toward the war booty to take it, "Let us follow you." They wish to change the words of Allah. Say, "Never will you follow us. Thus did Allah say before." So they will say, "Rather, you envy us." But [in fact] they were not understanding except a little.

Verse Text: قُلْ لِلْمُخَلَّفِينَ مِنَ الْأَعْرَابِ سَتُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى قَوْمٍ أُولِي بَأْسٍ شَدِيدٍ تُقَاتِلُونَهُمْ أَوْ يُسْلِمُونَ فَإِنْ تُطِيعُوا يُؤْتِكُمُ اللَّهُ أَجْرًا حَسَنًا وَإِنْ تَتَوَلَّوْا كَمَا تَوَلَّيْتُمْ مِنْ قَبْلُ يُعَذِّبْكُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
Verse Translation: Say to those who remained behind of the bedouins, "You will be called to [face] a people of great military might; you may fight them, or they will submit. So if you obey, Allah will give you a good reward; but if you turn away as you turned away before, He will punish you with a painful punishment."

Verse Text: لَيْسَ عَلَى الْأَعْمَى حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى الْأَعْرَجِ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى الْمَرِيضِ حَرَجٌ وَمَنْ يُطِعِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ يُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ وَمَنْ يَتَوَلَّ يُعَذِّبْهُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
Verse Translation: There is not upon the blind any guilt or upon the lame any guilt or upon the ill any guilt [for remaining behind]. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger - He will admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow; but whoever turns away - He will punish him with a painful punishment.

Verse Text: لَقَدْ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذْ يُبَايِعُونَكَ تَحْتَ الشَّجَرَةِ فَعَلِمَ مَا فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ فَأَنْزَلَ السَّكِينَةَ عَلَيْهِمْ وَأَثَابَهُمْ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا
Verse Translation: Certainly was Allah pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you, [O Muhammad], under the tree, and He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down tranquillity upon them and rewarded them with an imminent conquest

Verse Text: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةً يَأْخُذُونَهَا وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
Verse Translation: And much war booty which they will take. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.

Verse Text: وَعَدَكُمُ اللَّهُ مَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةً تَأْخُذُونَهَا فَعَجَّلَ لَكُمْ هَذِهِ وَكَفَّ أَيْدِيَ النَّاسِ عَنْكُمْ وَلِتَكُونَ آيَةً لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَيَهْدِيَكُمْ صِرَاطًا مُسْتَقِيمًا
Verse Translation: Allah has promised you much booty that you will take [in the future] and has hastened for you this [victory] and withheld the hands of people from you - that it may be a sign for the believers and [that] He may guide you to a straight path.

Verse Text: وَأُخْرَى لَمْ تَقْدِرُوا عَلَيْهَا قَدْ أَحَاطَ اللَّهُ بِهَا وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرًا
Verse Translation: And [He promises] other [victories] that you were [so far] unable to [realize] which Allah has already encompassed. And ever is Allah, over all things, competent.

Verse Text: وَلَوْ قَاتَلَكُمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَوَلَّوُا الْأَدْبَارَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيًّا وَلَا نَصِيرًا
Verse Translation: And if those [Makkans] who disbelieve had fought you, they would have turned their backs [in flight]. Then they would not find a protector or a helper.

Verse Text: سُنَّةَ اللَّهِ الَّتِي قَدْ خَلَتْ مِنْ قَبْلُ وَلَنْ تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ اللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا
Verse Translation: [This is] the established way of Allah which has occurred before. And never will you find in the way of Allah any change.

Verse Text: وَهُوَ الَّذِي كَفَّ أَيْدِيَهُمْ عَنْكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ عَنْهُمْ بِبَطْنِ مَكَّةَ مِنْ بَعْدِ أَنْ أَظْفَرَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا
Verse Translation: And it is He who withheld their hands from you and your hands from them within [the area of] Makkah after He caused you to overcome them. And ever is Allah of what you do, Seeing.

Verse Text: هُمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوكُمْ عَنِ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَالْهَدْيَ مَعْكُوفًا أَنْ يَبْلُغَ مَحِلَّهُ وَلَوْلَا رِجَالٌ مُؤْمِنُونَ وَنِسَاءٌ مُؤْمِنَاتٌ لَمْ تَعْلَمُوهُمْ أَنْ تَطَئُوهُمْ فَتُصِيبَكُمْ مِنْهُمْ مَعَرَّةٌ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ لِيُدْخِلَ اللَّهُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ مَنْ يَشَاءُ لَوْ تَزَيَّلُوا لَعَذَّبْنَا الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
Verse Translation: They are the ones who disbelieved and obstructed you from al-Masjid al-Haram while the offering was prevented from reaching its place of sacrifice. And if not for believing men and believing women whom you did not know - that you might trample them and there would befall you because of them dishonor without [your] knowledge - [you would have been permitted to enter Makkah]. [This was so] that Allah might admit to His mercy whom He willed. If they had been apart [from them], We would have punished those who disbelieved among them with painful punishment

Verse Text: إِذْ جَعَلَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ الْحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ الْجَاهِلِيَّةِ فَأَنْزَلَ اللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُ عَلَى رَسُولِهِ وَعَلَى الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَلْزَمَهُمْ كَلِمَةَ التَّقْوَى وَكَانُوا أَحَقَّ بِهَا وَأَهْلَهَا وَكَانَ اللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمًا
Verse Translation: When those who disbelieved had put into their hearts chauvinism - the chauvinism of the time of ignorance. But Allah sent down His tranquillity upon His Messenger and upon the believers and imposed upon them the word of righteousness, and they were more deserving of it and worthy of it. And ever is Allah, of all things, Knowing.

Verse Text: لَقَدْ صَدَقَ اللَّهُ رَسُولَهُ الرُّؤْيَا بِالْحَقِّ لَتَدْخُلُنَّ الْمَسْجِدَ الْحَرَامَ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ آمِنِينَ مُحَلِّقِينَ رُءُوسَكُمْ وَمُقَصِّرِينَ لَا تَخَافُونَ فَعَلِمَ مَا لَمْ تَعْلَمُوا فَجَعَلَ مِنْ دُونِ ذَلِكَ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا
Verse Translation: Certainly has Allah showed to His Messenger the vision in truth. You will surely enter al-Masjid al-Haram, if Allah wills, in safety, with your heads shaved and [hair] shortened, not fearing [anyone]. He knew what you did not know and has arranged before that a conquest near [at hand].

Verse Text: هُوَ الَّذِي أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُ بِالْهُدَى وَدِينِ الْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُ عَلَى الدِّينِ كُلِّهِ وَكَفَى بِاللَّهِ شَهِيدًا
Verse Translation: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion. And sufficient is Allah as Witness.

Verse Text: مُحَمَّدٌ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ وَالَّذِينَ مَعَهُ أَشِدَّاءُ عَلَى الْكُفَّارِ رُحَمَاءُ بَيْنَهُمْ تَرَاهُمْ رُكَّعًا سُجَّدًا يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًا مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرِضْوَانًا سِيمَاهُمْ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ مِنْ أَثَرِ السُّجُودِ ذَلِكَ مَثَلُهُمْ فِي التَّوْرَاةِ وَمَثَلُهُمْ فِي الْإِنْجِيلِ كَزَرْعٍ أَخْرَجَ شَطْأَهُ فَآزَرَهُ فَاسْتَغْلَظَ فَاسْتَوَى عَلَى سُوقِهِ يُعْجِبُ الزُّرَّاعَ لِيَغِيظَ بِهِمُ الْكُفَّارَ وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ مِنْهُمْ مَغْفِرَةً وَأَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
Verse Translation: Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah; and those with him are forceful against the disbelievers, merciful among themselves. You see them bowing and prostrating [in prayer], seeking bounty from Allah and [His] pleasure. Their mark is on their faces from the trace of prostration. That is their description in the Torah. And their description in the Gospel is as a plant which produces its offshoots and strengthens them so they grow firm and stand upon their stalks, delighting the sowers - so that Allah may enrage by them the disbelievers. Allah has promised those who believe and do righteous deeds among them forgiveness and a great reward.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تُقَدِّمُوا بَيْنَ يَدَيِ اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
Verse Translation: O you who have believed, do not put [yourselves] before Allah and His Messenger but fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Knowing.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَرْفَعُوا أَصْوَاتَكُمْ فَوْقَ صَوْتِ النَّبِيِّ وَلَا تَجْهَرُوا لَهُ بِالْقَوْلِ كَجَهْرِ بَعْضِكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ أَنْ تَحْبَطَ أَعْمَالُكُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
Verse Translation: O you who have believed, do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet or be loud to him in speech like the loudness of some of you to others, lest your deeds become worthless while you perceive not.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَغُضُّونَ أَصْوَاتَهُمْ عِنْدَ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ أُولَئِكَ الَّذِينَ امْتَحَنَ اللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمْ لِلتَّقْوَى لَهُمْ مَغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed, those who lower their voices before the Messenger of Allah - they are the ones whose hearts Allah has tested for righteousness. For them is forgiveness and great reward.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِنْ وَرَاءِ الْحُجُرَاتِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
Verse Translation: Indeed, those who call you, [O Muhammad], from behind the chambers - most of them do not use reason.

Verse Text: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ صَبَرُوا حَتَّى تَخْرُجَ إِلَيْهِمْ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَهُمْ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ
Verse Translation: And if they had been patient until you [could] come out to them, it would have been better for them. But Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِنْ جَاءَكُمْ فَاسِقٌ بِنَبَإٍ فَتَبَيَّنُوا أَنْ تُصِيبُوا قَوْمًا بِجَهَالَةٍ فَتُصْبِحُوا عَلَى مَا فَعَلْتُمْ نَادِمِينَ
Verse Translation: O you who have believed, if there comes to you a disobedient one with information, investigate, lest you harm a people out of ignorance and become, over what you have done, regretful.

Verse Text: وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ فِيكُمْ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ لَوْ يُطِيعُكُمْ فِي كَثِيرٍ مِنَ الْأَمْرِ لَعَنِتُّمْ وَلَكِنَّ اللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْإِيمَانَ وَزَيَّنَهُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْكُفْرَ وَالْفُسُوقَ وَالْعِصْيَانَ أُولَئِكَ هُمُ الرَّاشِدُونَ
Verse Translation: And know that among you is the Messenger of Allah. If he were to obey you in much of the matter, you would be in difficulty, but Allah has endeared to you the faith and has made it pleasing in your hearts and has made hateful to you disbelief, defiance and disobedience. Those are the [rightly] guided.

Verse Text: فَضْلًا مِنَ اللَّهِ وَنِعْمَةً وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
Verse Translation: [It is] as bounty from Allah and favor. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.

Verse Text: وَإِنْ طَائِفَتَانِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ اقْتَتَلُوا فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا فَإِنْ بَغَتْ إِحْدَاهُمَا عَلَى الْأُخْرَى فَقَاتِلُوا الَّتِي تَبْغِي حَتَّى تَفِيءَ إِلَى أَمْرِ اللَّهِ فَإِنْ فَاءَتْ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا بِالْعَدْلِ وَأَقْسِطُوا إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الْمُقْسِطِينَ
Verse Translation: And if two factions among the believers should fight, then make settlement between the two. But if one of them oppresses the other, then fight against the one that oppresses until it returns to the ordinance of Allah. And if it returns, then make settlement between them in justice and act justly. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly.

Verse Text: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَ أَخَوَيْكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
Verse Translation: The believers are but brothers, so make settlement between your brothers. And fear Allah that you may receive mercy.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا يَسْخَرْ قَوْمٌ مِنْ قَوْمٍ عَسَى أَنْ يَكُونُوا خَيْرًا مِنْهُمْ وَلَا نِسَاءٌ مِنْ نِسَاءٍ عَسَى أَنْ يَكُنَّ خَيْرًا مِنْهُنَّ وَلَا تَلْمِزُوا أَنْفُسَكُمْ وَلَا تَنَابَزُوا بِالْأَلْقَابِ بِئْسَ الِاسْمُ الْفُسُوقُ بَعْدَ الْإِيمَانِ وَمَنْ لَمْ يَتُبْ فَأُولَئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ
Verse Translation: O you who have believed, let not a people ridicule [another] people; perhaps they may be better than them; nor let women ridicule [other] women; perhaps they may be better than them. And do not insult one another and do not call each other by [offensive] nicknames. Wretched is the name of disobedience after [one's] faith. And whoever does not repent - then it is those who are the wrongdoers.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اجْتَنِبُوا كَثِيرًا مِنَ الظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعْضَ الظَّنِّ إِثْمٌ وَلَا تَجَسَّسُوا وَلَا يَغْتَبْ بَعْضُكُمْ بَعْضًا أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَنْ يَأْكُلَ لَحْمَ أَخِيهِ مَيْتًا فَكَرِهْتُمُوهُ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ إِنَّ اللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ رَحِيمٌ
Verse Translation: O you who have believed, avoid much [negative] assumption. Indeed, some assumption is sin. And do not spy or backbite each other. Would one of you like to eat the flesh of his brother when dead? You would detest it. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is Accepting of repentance and Merciful.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاكُمْ مِنْ ذَكَرٍ وَأُنْثَى وَجَعَلْنَاكُمْ شُعُوبًا وَقَبَائِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوا إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ أَتْقَاكُمْ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌ
Verse Translation: O mankind, indeed We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another. Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.

Verse Text: قَالَتِ الْأَعْرَابُ آمَنَّا قُلْ لَمْ تُؤْمِنُوا وَلَكِنْ قُولُوا أَسْلَمْنَا وَلَمَّا يَدْخُلِ الْإِيمَانُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ وَإِنْ تُطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ لَا يَلِتْكُمْ مِنْ أَعْمَالِكُمْ شَيْئًا إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ
Verse Translation: The bedouins say, "We have believed." Say, "You have not [yet] believed; but say [instead], 'We have submitted,' for faith has not yet entered your hearts. And if you obey Allah and His Messenger, He will not deprive you from your deeds of anything. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."

Verse Text: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَرْتَابُوا وَجَاهَدُوا بِأَمْوَالِهِمْ وَأَنْفُسِهِمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ أُولَئِكَ هُمُ الصَّادِقُونَ
Verse Translation: The believers are only the ones who have believed in Allah and His Messenger and then doubt not but strive with their properties and their lives in the cause of Allah. It is those who are the truthful.

Verse Text: قُلْ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ اللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمْ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
Verse Translation: Say, "Would you acquaint Allah with your religion while Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and Allah is Knowing of all things?"

Verse Text: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيْكَ أَنْ أَسْلَمُوا قُلْ لَا تَمُنُّوا عَلَيَّ إِسْلَامَكُمْ بَلِ اللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيْكُمْ أَنْ هَدَاكُمْ لِلْإِيمَانِ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
Verse Translation: They consider it a favor to you that they have accepted Islam. Say, "Do not consider your Islam a favor to me. Rather, Allah has conferred favor upon you that He has guided you to the faith, if you should be truthful."

Verse Text: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَاللَّهُ بَصِيرٌ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
Verse Translation: Indeed, Allah knows the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.

Verse Text: ق وَالْقُرْآنِ الْمَجِيدِ
Verse Translation: Qaf. By the honored Qur'an...

Verse Text: بَلْ عَجِبُوا أَنْ جَاءَهُمْ مُنْذِرٌ مِنْهُمْ فَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَذَا شَيْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
Verse Translation: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.

Verse Text: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ذَلِكَ رَجْعٌ بَعِيدٌ
Verse Translation: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant return."

Verse Text: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنْقُصُ الْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ وَعِنْدَنَا كِتَابٌ حَفِيظٌ
Verse Translation: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record.

Verse Text: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا بِالْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِي أَمْرٍ مَرِيجٍ
Verse Translation: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition.

Verse Text: أَفَلَمْ يَنْظُرُوا إِلَى السَّمَاءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَاهَا وَزَيَّنَّاهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِنْ فُرُوجٍ
Verse Translation: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts?

Verse Text: وَالْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَاهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَأَنْبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِنْ كُلِّ زَوْجٍ بَهِيجٍ
Verse Translation: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind,

Verse Text: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَى لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُنِيبٍ
Verse Translation: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah].

Verse Text: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً مُبَارَكًا فَأَنْبَتْنَا بِهِ جَنَّاتٍ وَحَبَّ الْحَصِيدِ
Verse Translation: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest

Verse Text: وَالنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَاتٍ لَهَا طَلْعٌ نَضِيدٌ
Verse Translation: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -

Verse Text: رِزْقًا لِلْعِبَادِ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ بَلْدَةً مَيْتًا كَذَلِكَ الْخُرُوجُ
Verse Translation: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection.

Verse Text: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
Verse Translation: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud

Verse Text: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَانُ لُوطٍ
Verse Translation: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot

Verse Text: وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
Verse Translation: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.

Verse Text: أَفَعَيِينَا بِالْخَلْقِ الْأَوَّلِ بَلْ هُمْ فِي لَبْسٍ مِنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
Verse Translation: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِ نَفْسُهُ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَرِيدِ
Verse Translation: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein

Verse Text: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى الْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
Verse Translation: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left.

Verse Text: مَا يَلْفِظُ مِنْ قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
Verse Translation: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].

Verse Text: وَجَاءَتْ سَكْرَةُ الْمَوْتِ بِالْحَقِّ ذَلِكَ مَا كُنْتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
Verse Translation: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.

Verse Text: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ ذَلِكَ يَوْمُ الْوَعِيدِ
Verse Translation: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.

Verse Text: وَجَاءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَعَهَا سَائِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
Verse Translation: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.

Verse Text: لَقَدْ كُنْتَ فِي غَفْلَةٍ مِنْ هَذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنْكَ غِطَاءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ الْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
Verse Translation: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp."

Verse Text: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُ هَذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ
Verse Translation: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."

Verse Text: أَلْقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
Verse Translation: [Allah will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever,

Verse Text: مَنَّاعٍ لِلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُرِيبٍ
Verse Translation: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter,

Verse Text: الَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَهًا آخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِي الْعَذَابِ الشَّدِيدِ
Verse Translation: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."

Verse Text: قَالَ قَرِينُهُ رَبَّنَا مَا أَطْغَيْتُهُ وَلَكِنْ كَانَ فِي ضَلَالٍ بَعِيدٍ
Verse Translation: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error."

Verse Text: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا لَدَيَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُمْ بِالْوَعِيدِ
Verse Translation: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning.

Verse Text: مَا يُبَدَّلُ الْقَوْلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَا أَنَا بِظَلَّامٍ لِلْعَبِيدِ
Verse Translation: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants."

Verse Text: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ امْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِنْ مَزِيدٍ
Verse Translation: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more,"

Verse Text: وَأُزْلِفَتِ الْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
Verse Translation: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,

Verse Text: هَذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
Verse Translation: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allah] and keeper [of His covenant]

Verse Text: مَنْ خَشِيَ الرَّحْمَنَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَجَاءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُنِيبٍ
Verse Translation: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].

Verse Text: ادْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَامٍ ذَلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُلُودِ
Verse Translation: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."

Verse Text: لَهُمْ مَا يَشَاءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
Verse Translation: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.

Verse Text: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُمْ مِنْ قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُمْ بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا فِي الْبِلَادِ هَلْ مِنْ مَحِيصٍ
Verse Translation: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape?

Verse Text: إِنَّ فِي ذَلِكَ لَذِكْرَى لِمَنْ كَانَ لَهُ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى السَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِنْ لُغُوبٍ
Verse Translation: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness.

Verse Text: فَاصْبِرْ عَلَى مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ الشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ الْغُرُوبِ
Verse Translation: So be patient, [O Muhammad], over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting,

Verse Text: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَارَ السُّجُودِ
Verse Translation: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration.

Verse Text: وَاسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ الْمُنَادِ مِنْ مَكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
Verse Translation: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near -

Verse Text: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ الصَّيْحَةَ بِالْحَقِّ ذَلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُرُوجِ
Verse Translation: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].

Verse Text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا الْمَصِيرُ
Verse Translation: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination

Verse Text: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ الْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ذَلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
Verse Translation: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us.

Verse Text: نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ وَمَا أَنْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ بِجَبَّارٍ فَذَكِّرْ بِالْقُرْآنِ مَنْ يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
Verse Translation: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat.

Verse Text: وَالذَّارِيَاتِ ذَرْوًا
Verse Translation: By those [winds] scattering [dust] dispersing

Verse Text: فَالْحَامِلَاتِ وِقْرًا
Verse Translation: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]

Verse Text: فَالْجَارِيَاتِ يُسْرًا
Verse Translation: And those [ships] sailing with ease

Verse Text: فَالْمُقَسِّمَاتِ أَمْرًا
Verse Translation: And those [angels] apportioning [each] matter,

Verse Text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed, what you are promised is true.

Verse Text: وَإِنَّ الدِّينَ لَوَاقِعٌ
Verse Translation: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.

Verse Text: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْحُبُكِ
Verse Translation: By the heaven containing pathways,

Verse Text: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِي قَوْلٍ مُخْتَلِفٍ
Verse Translation: Indeed, you are in differing speech.

Verse Text: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
Verse Translation: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded.

Verse Text: قُتِلَ الْخَرَّاصُونَ
Verse Translation: Destroyed are the falsifiers

Verse Text: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
Verse Translation: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.

Verse Text: يَسْأَلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
Verse Translation: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"

Verse Text: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى النَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
Verse Translation: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire

Verse Text: ذُوقُوا فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَذَا الَّذِي كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
Verse Translation: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."

Verse Text: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
Verse Translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,

Verse Text: آخِذِينَ مَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَبْلَ ذَلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
Verse Translation: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.

Verse Text: كَانُوا قَلِيلًا مِنَ اللَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
Verse Translation: They used to sleep but little of the night,

Verse Text: وَبِالْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
Verse Translation: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,

Verse Text: وَفِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
Verse Translation: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived.

Verse Text: وَفِي الْأَرْضِ آيَاتٌ لِلْمُوقِنِينَ
Verse Translation: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]

Verse Text: وَفِي أَنْفُسِكُمْ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
Verse Translation: And in yourselves. Then will you not see?

Verse Text: وَفِي السَّمَاءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
Verse Translation: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.

Verse Text: فَوَرَبِّ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُ لَحَقٌّ مِثْلَ مَا أَنَّكُمْ تَنْطِقُونَ
Verse Translation: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.

Verse Text: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
Verse Translation: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -

Verse Text: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا سَلَامًا قَالَ سَلَامٌ قَوْمٌ مُنْكَرُونَ
Verse Translation: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown.

Verse Text: فَرَاغَ إِلَى أَهْلِهِ فَجَاءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
Verse Translation: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf

Verse Text: فَقَرَّبَهُ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
Verse Translation: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"

Verse Text: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَامٍ عَلِيمٍ
Verse Translation: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.

Verse Text: فَأَقْبَلَتِ امْرَأَتُهُ فِي صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
Verse Translation: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman!"

Verse Text: قَالُوا كَذَلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْحَكِيمُ الْعَلِيمُ
Verse Translation: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."

Verse Text: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
Verse Translation: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"

Verse Text: قَالُوا إِنَّا أُرْسِلْنَا إِلَى قَوْمٍ مُجْرِمِينَ
Verse Translation: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

Verse Text: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِنْ طِينٍ
Verse Translation: To send down upon them stones of clay,

Verse Text: مُسَوَّمَةً عِنْدَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
Verse Translation: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."

Verse Text: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَنْ كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
Verse Translation: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.

Verse Text: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
Verse Translation: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.

Verse Text: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَا آيَةً لِلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ الْعَذَابَ الْأَلِيمَ
Verse Translation: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.

Verse Text: وَفِي مُوسَى إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَى فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَانٍ مُبِينٍ
Verse Translation: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.

Verse Text: فَتَوَلَّى بِرُكْنِهِ وَقَالَ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
Verse Translation: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman."

Verse Text: فَأَخَذْنَاهُ وَجُنُودَهُ فَنَبَذْنَاهُمْ فِي الْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
Verse Translation: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.

Verse Text: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ الرِّيحَ الْعَقِيمَ
Verse Translation: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.

Verse Text: مَا تَذَرُ مِنْ شَيْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَالرَّمِيمِ
Verse Translation: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.

Verse Text: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا حَتَّى حِينٍ
Verse Translation: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."

Verse Text: فَعَتَوْا عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ الصَّاعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنْظُرُونَ
Verse Translation: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.

Verse Text: فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مِنْ قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا مُنْتَصِرِينَ
Verse Translation: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.

Verse Text: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِنْ قَبْلُ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَوْمًا فَاسِقِينَ
Verse Translation: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.

Verse Text: وَالسَّمَاءَ بَنَيْنَاهَا بِأَيْدٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
Verse Translation: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.

Verse Text: وَالْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَاهَا فَنِعْمَ الْمَاهِدُونَ
Verse Translation: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.

Verse Text: وَمِنْ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
Verse Translation: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember.

Verse Text: فَفِرُّوا إِلَى اللَّهِ إِنِّي لَكُمْ مِنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُبِينٌ
Verse Translation: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

Verse Text: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَهًا آخَرَ إِنِّي لَكُمْ مِنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُبِينٌ
Verse Translation: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

Verse Text: كَذَلِكَ مَا أَتَى الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ مِنْ رَسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
Verse Translation: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman."

Verse Text: أَتَوَاصَوْا بِهِ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
Verse Translation: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.

Verse Text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَا أَنْتَ بِمَلُومٍ
Verse Translation: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed.

Verse Text: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ الذِّكْرَى تَنْفَعُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
Verse Translation: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.

Verse Text: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ الْجِنَّ وَالْإِنْسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
Verse Translation: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

Verse Text: مَا أُرِيدُ مِنْهُمْ مِنْ رِزْقٍ وَمَا أُرِيدُ أَنْ يُطْعِمُونِ
Verse Translation: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.

Verse Text: إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الرَّزَّاقُ ذُو الْقُوَّةِ الْمَتِينُ
Verse Translation: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.

Verse Text: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا ذَنُوبًا مِثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَابِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
Verse Translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me.

Verse Text: فَوَيْلٌ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ يَوْمِهِمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
Verse Translation: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.

Verse Text: وَالطُّورِ
Verse Translation: By the mount

Verse Text: وَكِتَابٍ مَسْطُورٍ
Verse Translation: And [by] a Book inscribed

Verse Text: فِي رَقٍّ مَنْشُورٍ
Verse Translation: In parchment spread open

Verse Text: وَالْبَيْتِ الْمَعْمُورِ
Verse Translation: And [by] the frequented House

Verse Text: وَالسَّقْفِ الْمَرْفُوعِ
Verse Translation: And [by] the heaven raised high

Verse Text: وَالْبَحْرِ الْمَسْجُورِ
Verse Translation: And [by] the sea filled [with fire],

Verse Text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَاقِعٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.

Verse Text: مَا لَهُ مِنْ دَافِعٍ
Verse Translation: Of it there is no preventer.

Verse Text: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ السَّمَاءُ مَوْرًا
Verse Translation: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

Verse Text: وَتَسِيرُ الْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
Verse Translation: And the mountains will pass on, departing -

Verse Text: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,

Verse Text: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
Verse Translation: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.

Verse Text: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
Verse Translation: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],

Verse Text: هَذِهِ النَّارُ الَّتِي كُنْتُمْ بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
Verse Translation: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.

Verse Text: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَذَا أَمْ أَنْتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
Verse Translation: Then is this magic, or do you not see?

Verse Text: اصْلَوْهَا فَاصْبِرُوا أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا سَوَاءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
Verse Translation: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do."

Verse Text: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
Verse Translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,

Verse Text: فَاكِهِينَ بِمَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ الْجَحِيمِ
Verse Translation: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.

Verse Text: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
Verse Translation: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

Verse Text: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَى سُرُرٍ مَصْفُوفَةٍ وَزَوَّجْنَاهُمْ بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
Verse Translation: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

Verse Text: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَاتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُمْ بِإِيمَانٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَا أَلَتْنَاهُمْ مِنْ عَمَلِهِمْ مِنْ شَيْءٍ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
Verse Translation: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained.

Verse Text: وَأَمْدَدْنَاهُمْ بِفَاكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
Verse Translation: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.

Verse Text: يَتَنَازَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
Verse Translation: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.

Verse Text: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَكْنُونٌ
Verse Translation: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.

Verse Text: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَى بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
Verse Translation: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

Verse Text: قَالُوا إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِي أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
Verse Translation: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah].

Verse Text: فَمَنَّ اللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَانَا عَذَابَ السَّمُومِ
Verse Translation: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.

Verse Text: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِنْ قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْبَرُّ الرَّحِيمُ
Verse Translation: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."

Verse Text: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَا أَنْتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
Verse Translation: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.

Verse Text: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَتَرَبَّصُ بِهِ رَيْبَ الْمَنُونِ
Verse Translation: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time?"

Verse Text: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا فَإِنِّي مَعَكُمْ مِنَ الْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
Verse Translation: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."

Verse Text: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَامُهُمْ بِهَذَا أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
Verse Translation: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?

Verse Text: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُ بَلْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
Verse Translation: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.

Verse Text: فَلْيَأْتُوا بِحَدِيثٍ مِثْلِهِ إِنْ كَانُوا صَادِقِينَ
Verse Translation: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.

Verse Text: أَمْ خُلِقُوا مِنْ غَيْرِ شَيْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ الْخَالِقُونَ
Verse Translation: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?

Verse Text: أَمْ خَلَقُوا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بَلْ لَا يُوقِنُونَ
Verse Translation: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.

Verse Text: أَمْ عِنْدَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ الْمُصَيْطِرُونَ
Verse Translation: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?

Verse Text: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُمْ بِسُلْطَانٍ مُبِينٍ
Verse Translation: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority.

Verse Text: أَمْ لَهُ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَكُمُ الْبَنُونَ
Verse Translation: Or has He daughters while you have sons?

Verse Text: أَمْ تَسْأَلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُمْ مِنْ مَغْرَمٍ مُثْقَلُونَ
Verse Translation: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

Verse Text: أَمْ عِنْدَهُمُ الْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
Verse Translation: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

Verse Text: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا فَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا هُمُ الْمَكِيدُونَ
Verse Translation: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.

Verse Text: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَهٌ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
Verse Translation: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.

Verse Text: وَإِنْ يَرَوْا كِسْفًا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا سَحَابٌ مَرْكُومٌ
Verse Translation: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."

Verse Text: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّى يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
Verse Translation: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -

Verse Text: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا هُمْ يُنْصَرُونَ
Verse Translation: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.

Verse Text: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَلِكَ وَلَكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
Verse Translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.

Verse Text: وَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
Verse Translation: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise.

Verse Text: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَارَ النُّجُومِ
Verse Translation: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.

Verse Text: وَالنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَى
Verse Translation: By the star when it descends,

Verse Text: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمْ وَمَا غَوَى
Verse Translation: Your companion [Muhammad] has not strayed, nor has he erred,

Verse Text: وَمَا يَنْطِقُ عَنِ الْهَوَى
Verse Translation: Nor does he speak from [his own] inclination.

Verse Text: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحْيٌ يُوحَى
Verse Translation: It is not but a revelation revealed,

Verse Text: عَلَّمَهُ شَدِيدُ الْقُوَى
Verse Translation: Taught to him by one intense in strength -

Verse Text: ذُو مِرَّةٍ فَاسْتَوَى
Verse Translation: One of soundness. And he rose to [his] true form

Verse Text: وَهُوَ بِالْأُفُقِ الْأَعْلَى
Verse Translation: While he was in the higher [part of the] horizon.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّى
Verse Translation: Then he approached and descended

Verse Text: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوْسَيْنِ أَوْ أَدْنَى
Verse Translation: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer.

Verse Text: فَأَوْحَى إِلَى عَبْدِهِ مَا أَوْحَى
Verse Translation: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed.

Verse Text: مَا كَذَبَ الْفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَى
Verse Translation: The heart did not lie [about] what it saw.

Verse Text: أَفَتُمَارُونَهُ عَلَى مَا يَرَى
Verse Translation: So will you dispute with him over what he saw?

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ نَزْلَةً أُخْرَى
Verse Translation: And he certainly saw him in another descent

Verse Text: عِنْدَ سِدْرَةِ الْمُنْتَهَى
Verse Translation: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary -

Verse Text: عِنْدَهَا جَنَّةُ الْمَأْوَى
Verse Translation: Near it is the Garden of Refuge -

Verse Text: إِذْ يَغْشَى السِّدْرَةَ مَا يَغْشَى
Verse Translation: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it].

Verse Text: مَا زَاغَ الْبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَى
Verse Translation: The sight [of the Prophet] did not swerve, nor did it transgress [its limit].

Verse Text: لَقَدْ رَأَى مِنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِ الْكُبْرَى
Verse Translation: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.

Verse Text: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ اللَّاتَ وَالْعُزَّى
Verse Translation: So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza?

Verse Text: وَمَنَاةَ الثَّالِثَةَ الْأُخْرَى
Verse Translation: And Manat, the third - the other one?

Verse Text: أَلَكُمُ الذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ الْأُنْثَى
Verse Translation: Is the male for you and for Him the female?

Verse Text: تِلْكَ إِذًا قِسْمَةٌ ضِيزَى
Verse Translation: That, then, is an unjust division.

Verse Text: إِنْ هِيَ إِلَّا أَسْمَاءٌ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَا أَنْتُمْ وَآبَاؤُكُمْ مَا أَنْزَلَ اللَّهُ بِهَا مِنْ سُلْطَانٍ إِنْ يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى الْأَنْفُسُ وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُمْ مِنْ رَبِّهِمُ الْهُدَى
Verse Translation: They are not but [mere] names you have named them - you and your forefathers - for which Allah has sent down no authority. They follow not except assumption and what [their] souls desire, and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance.

Verse Text: أَمْ لِلْإِنْسَانِ مَا تَمَنَّى
Verse Translation: Or is there for man whatever he wishes?

Verse Text: فَلِلَّهِ الْآخِرَةُ وَالْأُولَى
Verse Translation: Rather, to Allah belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

Verse Text: وَكَمْ مِنْ مَلَكٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ لَا تُغْنِي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا إِلَّا مِنْ بَعْدِ أَنْ يَأْذَنَ اللَّهُ لِمَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيَرْضَى
Verse Translation: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except [only] after Allah has permitted [it] to whom He wills and approves.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْآخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ الْمَلَائِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ الْأُنْثَى
Verse Translation: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names,

Verse Text: وَمَا لَهُمْ بِهِ مِنْ عِلْمٍ إِنْ يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَإِنَّ الظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِي مِنَ الْحَقِّ شَيْئًا
Verse Translation: And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all.

Verse Text: فَأَعْرِضْ عَنْ مَنْ تَوَلَّى عَنْ ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
Verse Translation: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life.

Verse Text: ذَلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُمْ مِنَ الْعِلْمِ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنْ ضَلَّ عَنْ سَبِيلِهِ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اهْتَدَى
Verse Translation: That is their sum of knowledge. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of who is guided.

Verse Text: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسَاءُوا بِمَا عَمِلُوا وَيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا بِالْحُسْنَى
Verse Translation: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward] -

Verse Text: الَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَائِرَ الْإِثْمِ وَالْفَوَاحِشَ إِلَّا اللَّمَمَ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَاسِعُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنْشَأَكُمْ مِنَ الْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنْتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ فَلَا تُزَكُّوا أَنْفُسَكُمْ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اتَّقَى
Verse Translation: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only [committing] slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him.

Verse Text: أَفَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي تَوَلَّى
Verse Translation: Have you seen the one who turned away

Verse Text: وَأَعْطَى قَلِيلًا وَأَكْدَى
Verse Translation: And gave a little and [then] refrained?

Verse Text: أَعِنْدَهُ عِلْمُ الْغَيْبِ فَهُوَ يَرَى
Verse Translation: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees?

Verse Text: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَى
Verse Translation: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses

Verse Text: وَإِبْرَاهِيمَ الَّذِي وَفَّى
Verse Translation: And [of] Abraham, who fulfilled [his obligations] -

Verse Text: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَى
Verse Translation: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another

Verse Text: وَأَنْ لَيْسَ لِلْإِنْسَانِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَى
Verse Translation: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives

Verse Text: وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُ سَوْفَ يُرَى
Verse Translation: And that his effort is going to be seen -

Verse Text: ثُمَّ يُجْزَاهُ الْجَزَاءَ الْأَوْفَى
Verse Translation: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense

Verse Text: وَأَنَّ إِلَى رَبِّكَ الْمُنْتَهَى
Verse Translation: And that to your Lord is the finality

Verse Text: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَضْحَكَ وَأَبْكَى
Verse Translation: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep

Verse Text: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحْيَا
Verse Translation: And that it is He who causes death and gives life

Verse Text: وَأَنَّهُ خَلَقَ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنْثَى
Verse Translation: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -

Verse Text: مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ إِذَا تُمْنَى
Verse Translation: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted

Verse Text: وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ النَّشْأَةَ الْأُخْرَى
Verse Translation: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation

Verse Text: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَغْنَى وَأَقْنَى
Verse Translation: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

Verse Text: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ رَبُّ الشِّعْرَى
Verse Translation: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius

Verse Text: وَأَنَّهُ أَهْلَكَ عَادًا الْأُولَى
Verse Translation: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad

Verse Text: وَثَمُودَ فَمَا أَبْقَى
Verse Translation: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them] -

Verse Text: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِنْ قَبْلُ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَى
Verse Translation: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.

Verse Text: وَالْمُؤْتَفِكَةَ أَهْوَى
Verse Translation: And the overturned towns He hurled down

Verse Text: فَغَشَّاهَا مَا غَشَّى
Verse Translation: And covered them by that which He covered.

Verse Text: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَى
Verse Translation: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?

Verse Text: هَذَا نَذِيرٌ مِنَ النُّذُرِ الْأُولَى
Verse Translation: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.

Verse Text: أَزِفَتِ الْآزِفَةُ
Verse Translation: The Approaching Day has approached.

Verse Text: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
Verse Translation: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover.

Verse Text: أَفَمِنْ هَذَا الْحَدِيثِ تَعْجَبُونَ
Verse Translation: Then at this statement do you wonder?

Verse Text: وَتَضْحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبْكُونَ
Verse Translation: And you laugh and do not weep

Verse Text: وَأَنْتُمْ سَامِدُونَ
Verse Translation: While you are proudly sporting?

Verse Text: فَاسْجُدُوا لِلَّهِ وَاعْبُدُوا
Verse Translation: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him].

Verse Text: اقْتَرَبَتِ السَّاعَةُ وَانْشَقَّ الْقَمَرُ
Verse Translation: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].

Verse Text: وَإِنْ يَرَوْا آيَةً يُعْرِضُوا وَيَقُولُوا سِحْرٌ مُسْتَمِرٌّ
Verse Translation: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."

Verse Text: وَكَذَّبُوا وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُسْتَقِرٌّ
Verse Translation: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُمْ مِنَ الْأَنْبَاءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
Verse Translation: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -

Verse Text: حِكْمَةٌ بَالِغَةٌ فَمَا تُغْنِ النُّذُرُ
Verse Translation: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].

Verse Text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ الدَّاعِ إِلَى شَيْءٍ نُكُرٍ
Verse Translation: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,

Verse Text: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَارُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُنْتَشِرٌ
Verse Translation: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,

Verse Text: مُهْطِعِينَ إِلَى الدَّاعِ يَقُولُ الْكَافِرُونَ هَذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
Verse Translation: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."

Verse Text: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا مَجْنُونٌ وَازْدُجِرَ
Verse Translation: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.

Verse Text: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَغْلُوبٌ فَانْتَصِرْ
Verse Translation: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."

Verse Text: فَفَتَحْنَا أَبْوَابَ السَّمَاءِ بِمَاءٍ مُنْهَمِرٍ
Verse Translation: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down

Verse Text: وَفَجَّرْنَا الْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَالْتَقَى الْمَاءُ عَلَى أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
Verse Translation: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.

Verse Text: وَحَمَلْنَاهُ عَلَى ذَاتِ أَلْوَاحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
Verse Translation: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,

Verse Text: تَجْرِي بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَاءً لِمَنْ كَانَ كُفِرَ
Verse Translation: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ تَرَكْنَاهَا آيَةً فَهَلْ مِنْ مُدَّكِرٍ
Verse Translation: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?

Verse Text: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
Verse Translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِنْ مُدَّكِرٍ
Verse Translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

Verse Text: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
Verse Translation: 'Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

Verse Text: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِي يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُسْتَمِرٍّ
Verse Translation: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,

Verse Text: تَنْزِعُ النَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُنْقَعِرٍ
Verse Translation: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.

Verse Text: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
Verse Translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِنْ مُدَّكِرٍ
Verse Translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

Verse Text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِالنُّذُرِ
Verse Translation: Thamud denied the warning

Verse Text: فَقَالُوا أَبَشَرًا مِنَّا وَاحِدًا نَتَّبِعُهُ إِنَّا إِذًا لَفِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
Verse Translation: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.

Verse Text: أَأُلْقِيَ الذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
Verse Translation: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."

Verse Text: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَنِ الْكَذَّابُ الْأَشِرُ
Verse Translation: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.

Verse Text: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُو النَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَهُمْ فَارْتَقِبْهُمْ وَاصْطَبِرْ
Verse Translation: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.

Verse Text: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ الْمَاءَ قِسْمَةٌ بَيْنَهُمْ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُحْتَضَرٌ
Verse Translation: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].

Verse Text: فَنَادَوْا صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَى فَعَقَرَ
Verse Translation: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].

Verse Text: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
Verse Translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

Verse Text: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَكَانُوا كَهَشِيمِ الْمُحْتَظِرِ
Verse Translation: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِنْ مُدَّكِرٍ
Verse Translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

Verse Text: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ بِالنُّذُرِ
Verse Translation: The people of Lot denied the warning.

Verse Text: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّا آلَ لُوطٍ نَجَّيْنَاهُمْ بِسَحَرٍ
Verse Translation: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn

Verse Text: نِعْمَةً مِنْ عِنْدِنَا كَذَلِكَ نَجْزِي مَنْ شَكَرَ
Verse Translation: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ أَنْذَرَهُمْ بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا بِالنُّذُرِ
