Verse Text: يَوْمَ يَجْمَعُكُمْ لِيَوْمِ الْجَمْعِ ذَلِكَ يَوْمُ التَّغَابُنِ وَمَنْ يُؤْمِنْ بِاللَّهِ وَيَعْمَلْ صَالِحًا يُكَفِّرْ عَنْهُ سَيِّئَاتِهِ وَيُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ذَلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
Verse Translation: The Day He will assemble you for the Day of Assembly - that is the Day of Deprivation. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will remove from him his misdeeds and admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. That is the great attainment.

Verse Text: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا أُولَئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا وَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ
Verse Translation: But the ones who disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of the Fire, abiding eternally therein; and wretched is the destination.

Verse Text: مَا أَصَابَ مِنْ مُصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ وَمَنْ يُؤْمِنْ بِاللَّهِ يَهْدِ قَلْبَهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
Verse Translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah. And whoever believes in Allah - He will guide his heart. And Allah is Knowing of all things.

Verse Text: وَأَطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا الرَّسُولَ فَإِنْ تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَى رَسُولِنَا الْبَلَاغُ الْمُبِينُ
Verse Translation: And obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon Our Messenger is only [the duty of] clear notification.

Verse Text: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ
Verse Translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him. And upon Allah let the believers rely.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِنَّ مِنْ أَزْوَاجِكُمْ وَأَوْلَادِكُمْ عَدُوًّا لَكُمْ فَاحْذَرُوهُمْ وَإِنْ تَعْفُوا وَتَصْفَحُوا وَتَغْفِرُوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ
Verse Translation: O you who have believed, indeed, among your wives and your children are enemies to you, so beware of them. But if you pardon and overlook and forgive - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

Verse Text: إِنَّمَا أَمْوَالُكُمْ وَأَوْلَادُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌ وَاللَّهُ عِنْدَهُ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
Verse Translation: Your wealth and your children are but a trial, and Allah has with Him a great reward.

Verse Text: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُمْ وَاسْمَعُوا وَأَطِيعُوا وَأَنْفِقُوا خَيْرًا لِأَنْفُسِكُمْ وَمَنْ يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفْسِهِ فَأُولَئِكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ
Verse Translation: So fear Allah as much as you are able and listen and obey and spend [in the way of Allah]; it is better for your selves. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful.

Verse Text: إِنْ تُقْرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا يُضَاعِفْهُ لَكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ وَاللَّهُ شَكُورٌ حَلِيمٌ
Verse Translation: If you loan Allah a goodly loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you. And Allah is Most Appreciative and Forbearing.

Verse Text: عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
Verse Translation: Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ إِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَطَلِّقُوهُنَّ لِعِدَّتِهِنَّ وَأَحْصُوا الْعِدَّةَ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ لَا تُخْرِجُوهُنَّ مِنْ بُيُوتِهِنَّ وَلَا يَخْرُجْنَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَأْتِينَ بِفَاحِشَةٍ مُبَيِّنَةٍ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ وَمَنْ يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُ لَا تَدْرِي لَعَلَّ اللَّهَ يُحْدِثُ بَعْدَ ذَلِكَ أَمْرًا
Verse Translation: O Prophet, when you [Muslims] divorce women, divorce them for [the commencement of] their waiting period and keep count of the waiting period, and fear Allah, your Lord. Do not turn them out of their [husbands'] houses, nor should they [themselves] leave [during that period] unless they are committing a clear immorality. And those are the limits [set by] Allah. And whoever transgresses the limits of Allah has certainly wronged himself. You know not; perhaps Allah will bring about after that a [different] matter.

Verse Text: فَإِذَا بَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ فَارِقُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ وَأَشْهِدُوا ذَوَيْ عَدْلٍ مِنْكُمْ وَأَقِيمُوا الشَّهَادَةَ لِلَّهِ ذَلِكُمْ يُوعَظُ بِهِ مَنْ كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَمَنْ يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجْعَلْ لَهُ مَخْرَجًا
Verse Translation: And when they have [nearly] fulfilled their term, either retain them according to acceptable terms or part with them according to acceptable terms. And bring to witness two just men from among you and establish the testimony for [the acceptance of] Allah. That is instructed to whoever should believe in Allah and the Last day. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out

Verse Text: وَيَرْزُقْهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَحْتَسِبُ وَمَنْ يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بَالِغُ أَمْرِهِ قَدْ جَعَلَ اللَّهُ لِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدْرًا
Verse Translation: And will provide for him from where he does not expect. And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose. Allah has already set for everything a [decreed] extent.

Verse Text: وَاللَّائِي يَئِسْنَ مِنَ الْمَحِيضِ مِنْ نِسَائِكُمْ إِنِ ارْتَبْتُمْ فَعِدَّتُهُنَّ ثَلَاثَةُ أَشْهُرٍ وَاللَّائِي لَمْ يَحِضْنَ وَأُولَاتُ الْأَحْمَالِ أَجَلُهُنَّ أَنْ يَضَعْنَ حَمْلَهُنَّ وَمَنْ يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجْعَلْ لَهُ مِنْ أَمْرِهِ يُسْرًا
Verse Translation: And those who no longer expect menstruation among your women - if you doubt, then their period is three months, and [also for] those who have not menstruated. And for those who are pregnant, their term is until they give birth. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him of his matter ease.

Verse Text: ذَلِكَ أَمْرُ اللَّهِ أَنْزَلَهُ إِلَيْكُمْ وَمَنْ يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يُكَفِّرْ عَنْهُ سَيِّئَاتِهِ وَيُعْظِمْ لَهُ أَجْرًا
Verse Translation: That is the command of Allah, which He has sent down to you; and whoever fears Allah - He will remove for him his misdeeds and make great for him his reward.

Verse Text: أَسْكِنُوهُنَّ مِنْ حَيْثُ سَكَنْتُمْ مِنْ وُجْدِكُمْ وَلَا تُضَارُّوهُنَّ لِتُضَيِّقُوا عَلَيْهِنَّ وَإِنْ كُنَّ أُولَاتِ حَمْلٍ فَأَنْفِقُوا عَلَيْهِنَّ حَتَّى يَضَعْنَ حَمْلَهُنَّ فَإِنْ أَرْضَعْنَ لَكُمْ فَآتُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ وَأْتَمِرُوا بَيْنَكُمْ بِمَعْرُوفٍ وَإِنْ تَعَاسَرْتُمْ فَسَتُرْضِعُ لَهُ أُخْرَى
Verse Translation: Lodge them [in a section] of where you dwell out of your means and do not harm them in order to oppress them. And if they should be pregnant, then spend on them until they give birth. And if they breastfeed for you, then give them their payment and confer among yourselves in the acceptable way; but if you are in discord, then there may breastfeed for the father another woman.

Verse Text: لِيُنْفِقْ ذُو سَعَةٍ مِنْ سَعَتِهِ وَمَنْ قُدِرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقُهُ فَلْيُنْفِقْ مِمَّا آتَاهُ اللَّهُ لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا مَا آتَاهَا سَيَجْعَلُ اللَّهُ بَعْدَ عُسْرٍ يُسْرًا
Verse Translation: Let a man of wealth spend from his wealth, and he whose provision is restricted - let him spend from what Allah has given him. Allah does not charge a soul except [according to] what He has given it. Allah will bring about, after hardship, ease.

Verse Text: وَكَأَيِّنْ مِنْ قَرْيَةٍ عَتَتْ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهَا وَرُسُلِهِ فَحَاسَبْنَاهَا حِسَابًا شَدِيدًا وَعَذَّبْنَاهَا عَذَابًا نُكْرًا
Verse Translation: And how many a city was insolent toward the command of its Lord and His messengers, so We took it to severe account and punished it with a terrible punishment.

Verse Text: فَذَاقَتْ وَبَالَ أَمْرِهَا وَكَانَ عَاقِبَةُ أَمْرِهَا خُسْرًا
Verse Translation: And it tasted the bad consequence of its affair, and the outcome of its affair was loss.

Verse Text: أَعَدَّ اللَّهُ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ يَا أُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا قَدْ أَنْزَلَ اللَّهُ إِلَيْكُمْ ذِكْرًا
Verse Translation: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment; so fear Allah, O you of understanding who have believed. Allah has sent down to you the Qur'an.

Verse Text: رَسُولًا يَتْلُو عَلَيْكُمْ آيَاتِ اللَّهِ مُبَيِّنَاتٍ لِيُخْرِجَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ مِنَ الظُّلُمَاتِ إِلَى النُّورِ وَمَنْ يُؤْمِنْ بِاللَّهِ وَيَعْمَلْ صَالِحًا يُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا قَدْ أَحْسَنَ اللَّهُ لَهُ رِزْقًا
Verse Translation: [He sent] a Messenger [Muhammad] reciting to you the distinct verses of Allah that He may bring out those who believe and do righteous deeds from darknesses into the light. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will admit him into gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein forever. Allah will have perfected for him a provision.

Verse Text: اللَّهُ الَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ وَمِنَ الْأَرْضِ مِثْلَهُنَّ يَتَنَزَّلُ الْأَمْرُ بَيْنَهُنَّ لِتَعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ قَدْ أَحَاطَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عِلْمًا
Verse Translation: It is Allah who has created seven heavens and of the earth, the like of them. [His] command descends among them so you may know that Allah is over all things competent and that Allah has encompassed all things in knowledge.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ مَا أَحَلَّ اللَّهُ لَكَ تَبْتَغِي مَرْضَاتَ أَزْوَاجِكَ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ
Verse Translation: O Prophet, why do you prohibit [yourself from] what Allah has made lawful for you, seeking the approval of your wives? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

Verse Text: قَدْ فَرَضَ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ تَحِلَّةَ أَيْمَانِكُمْ وَاللَّهُ مَوْلَاكُمْ وَهُوَ الْعَلِيمُ الْحَكِيمُ
Verse Translation: Allah has already ordained for you [Muslims] the dissolution of your oaths. And Allah is your protector, and He is the Knowing, the Wise.

Verse Text: وَإِذْ أَسَرَّ النَّبِيُّ إِلَى بَعْضِ أَزْوَاجِهِ حَدِيثًا فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَتْ بِهِ وَأَظْهَرَهُ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ عَرَّفَ بَعْضَهُ وَأَعْرَضَ عَنْ بَعْضٍ فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَهَا بِهِ قَالَتْ مَنْ أَنْبَأَكَ هَذَا قَالَ نَبَّأَنِيَ الْعَلِيمُ الْخَبِيرُ
Verse Translation: And [remember] when the Prophet confided to one of his wives a statement; and when she informed [another] of it and Allah showed it to him, he made known part of it and ignored a part. And when he informed her about it, she said, "Who told you this?" He said, "I was informed by the Knowing, the Acquainted."

Verse Text: إِنْ تَتُوبَا إِلَى اللَّهِ فَقَدْ صَغَتْ قُلُوبُكُمَا وَإِنْ تَظَاهَرَا عَلَيْهِ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ مَوْلَاهُ وَجِبْرِيلُ وَصَالِحُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ بَعْدَ ذَلِكَ ظَهِيرٌ
Verse Translation: If you two [wives] repent to Allah, [it is best], for your hearts have deviated. But if you cooperate against him - then indeed Allah is his protector, and Gabriel and the righteous of the believers and the angels, moreover, are [his] assistants.

Verse Text: عَسَى رَبُّهُ إِنْ طَلَّقَكُنَّ أَنْ يُبْدِلَهُ أَزْوَاجًا خَيْرًا مِنْكُنَّ مُسْلِمَاتٍ مُؤْمِنَاتٍ قَانِتَاتٍ تَائِبَاتٍ عَابِدَاتٍ سَائِحَاتٍ ثَيِّبَاتٍ وَأَبْكَارًا
Verse Translation: Perhaps his Lord, if he divorced you [all], would substitute for him wives better than you - submitting [to Allah], believing, devoutly obedient, repentant, worshipping, and traveling - [ones] previously married and virgins.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا قُوا أَنْفُسَكُمْ وَأَهْلِيكُمْ نَارًا وَقُودُهَا النَّاسُ وَالْحِجَارَةُ عَلَيْهَا مَلَائِكَةٌ غِلَاظٌ شِدَادٌ لَا يَعْصُونَ اللَّهَ مَا أَمَرَهُمْ وَيَفْعَلُونَ مَا يُؤْمَرُونَ
Verse Translation: O you who have believed, protect yourselves and your families from a Fire whose fuel is people and stones, over which are [appointed] angels, harsh and severe; they do not disobey Allah in what He commands them but do what they are commanded.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَا تَعْتَذِرُوا الْيَوْمَ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
Verse Translation: O you who have disbelieved, make no excuses that Day. You will only be recompensed for what you used to do.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا تُوبُوا إِلَى اللَّهِ تَوْبَةً نَصُوحًا عَسَى رَبُّكُمْ أَنْ يُكَفِّرَ عَنْكُمْ سَيِّئَاتِكُمْ وَيُدْخِلَكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ يَوْمَ لَا يُخْزِي اللَّهُ النَّبِيَّ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مَعَهُ نُورُهُمْ يَسْعَى بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَبِأَيْمَانِهِمْ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا أَتْمِمْ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا إِنَّكَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
Verse Translation: O you who have believed, repent to Allah with sincere repentance. Perhaps your Lord will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you into gardens beneath which rivers flow [on] the Day when Allah will not disgrace the Prophet and those who believed with him. Their light will proceed before them and on their right; they will say, "Our Lord, perfect for us our light and forgive us. Indeed, You are over all things competent."

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ جَاهِدِ الْكُفَّارَ وَالْمُنَافِقِينَ وَاغْلُظْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَمَأْوَاهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ وَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ
Verse Translation: O Prophet, strive against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh upon them. And their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the destination.

Verse Text: ضَرَبَ اللَّهُ مَثَلًا لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا امْرَأَتَ نُوحٍ وَامْرَأَتَ لُوطٍ كَانَتَا تَحْتَ عَبْدَيْنِ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا صَالِحَيْنِ فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمْ يُغْنِيَا عَنْهُمَا مِنَ اللَّهِ شَيْئًا وَقِيلَ ادْخُلَا النَّارَ مَعَ الدَّاخِلِينَ
Verse Translation: Allah presents an example of those who disbelieved: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. They were under two of Our righteous servants but betrayed them, so those prophets did not avail them from Allah at all, and it was said, "Enter the Fire with those who enter."

Verse Text: وَضَرَبَ اللَّهُ مَثَلًا لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا امْرَأَتَ فِرْعَوْنَ إِذْ قَالَتْ رَبِّ ابْنِ لِي عِنْدَكَ بَيْتًا فِي الْجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِي مِنْ فِرْعَوْنَ وَعَمَلِهِ وَنَجِّنِي مِنَ الْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ
Verse Translation: And Allah presents an example of those who believed: the wife of Pharaoh, when she said, "My Lord, build for me near You a house in Paradise and save me from Pharaoh and his deeds and save me from the wrongdoing people."

Verse Text: وَمَرْيَمَ ابْنَتَ عِمْرَانَ الَّتِي أَحْصَنَتْ فَرْجَهَا فَنَفَخْنَا فِيهِ مِنْ رُوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتْ بِكَلِمَاتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِ وَكَانَتْ مِنَ الْقَانِتِينَ
Verse Translation: And [the example of] Mary, the daughter of 'Imran, who guarded her chastity, so We blew into [her garment] through Our angel, and she believed in the words of her Lord and His scriptures and was of the devoutly obedient.

Verse Text: تَبَارَكَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ الْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
Verse Translation: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent -

Verse Text: الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْمَوْتَ وَالْحَيَاةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفُورُ
Verse Translation: [He] who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed - and He is the Exalted in Might, the Forgiving -

Verse Text: الَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا مَا تَرَى فِي خَلْقِ الرَّحْمَنِ مِنْ تَفَاوُتٍ فَارْجِعِ الْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَى مِنْ فُطُورٍ
Verse Translation: [And] who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency. So return [your] vision [to the sky]; do you see any breaks?

Verse Text: ثُمَّ ارْجِعِ الْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَنْقَلِبْ إِلَيْكَ الْبَصَرُ خَاسِئًا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٌ
Verse Translation: Then return [your] vision twice again. [Your] vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued.

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِمَصَابِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَاهَا رُجُومًا لِلشَّيَاطِينِ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ السَّعِيرِ
Verse Translation: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made [from] them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze.

Verse Text: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ
Verse Translation: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell, and wretched is the destination.

Verse Text: إِذَا أُلْقُوا فِيهَا سَمِعُوا لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ
Verse Translation: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.

Verse Text: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ الْغَيْظِ كُلَّمَا أُلْقِيَ فِيهَا فَوْجٌ سَأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَا أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذِيرٌ
Verse Translation: It almost bursts with rage. Every time a company is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, "Did there not come to you a warner?"

Verse Text: قَالُوا بَلَى قَدْ جَاءَنَا نَذِيرٌ فَكَذَّبْنَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ اللَّهُ مِنْ شَيْءٍ إِنْ أَنْتُمْ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَالٍ كَبِيرٍ
Verse Translation: They will say," Yes, a warner had come to us, but we denied and said, 'Allah has not sent down anything. You are not but in great error.'"

Verse Text: وَقَالُوا لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِي أَصْحَابِ السَّعِيرِ
Verse Translation: And they will say, "If only we had been listening or reasoning, we would not be among the companions of the Blaze."

Verse Text: فَاعْتَرَفُوا بِذَنْبِهِمْ فَسُحْقًا لِأَصْحَابِ السَّعِيرِ
Verse Translation: And they will admit their sin, so [it is] alienation for the companions of the Blaze.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ بِالْغَيْبِ لَهُمْ مَغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward.

Verse Text: وَأَسِرُّوا قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ اجْهَرُوا بِهِ إِنَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
Verse Translation: And conceal your speech or publicize it; indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

Verse Text: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ اللَّطِيفُ الْخَبِيرُ
Verse Translation: Does He who created not know, while He is the Subtle, the Acquainted?

Verse Text: هُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًا فَامْشُوا فِي مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا مِنْ رِزْقِهِ وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
Verse Translation: It is He who made the earth tame for you - so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision - and to Him is the resurrection.

Verse Text: أَأَمِنْتُمْ مَنْ فِي السَّمَاءِ أَنْ يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ الْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ
Verse Translation: Do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway?

Verse Text: أَمْ أَمِنْتُمْ مَنْ فِي السَّمَاءِ أَنْ يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ
Verse Translation: Or do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not send against you a storm of stones? Then you would know how [severe] was My warning.

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
Verse Translation: And already had those before them denied, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

Verse Text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا إِلَى الطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَافَّاتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا الرَّحْمَنُ إِنَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ بَصِيرٌ
Verse Translation: Do they not see the birds above them with wings outspread and [sometimes] folded in? None holds them [aloft] except the Most Merciful. Indeed He is, of all things, Seeing.

Verse Text: أَمَّنْ هَذَا الَّذِي هُوَ جُنْدٌ لَكُمْ يَنْصُرُكُمْ مِنْ دُونِ الرَّحْمَنِ إِنِ الْكَافِرُونَ إِلَّا فِي غُرُورٍ
Verse Translation: Or who is it that could be an army for you to aid you other than the Most Merciful? The disbelievers are not but in delusion.

Verse Text: أَمَّنْ هَذَا الَّذِي يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُ بَلْ لَجُّوا فِي عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ
Verse Translation: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion.

Verse Text: أَفَمَنْ يَمْشِي مُكِبًّا عَلَى وَجْهِهِ أَهْدَى أَمَّنْ يَمْشِي سَوِيًّا عَلَى صِرَاطٍ مُسْتَقِيمٍ
Verse Translation: Then is one who walks fallen on his face better guided or one who walks erect on a straight path?

Verse Text: قُلْ هُوَ الَّذِي أَنْشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ السَّمْعَ وَالْأَبْصَارَ وَالْأَفْئِدَةَ قَلِيلًا مَا تَشْكُرُونَ
Verse Translation: Say, "It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful."

Verse Text: قُلْ هُوَ الَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
Verse Translation: Say, "It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered."

Verse Text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَى هَذَا الْوَعْدُ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
Verse Translation: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

Verse Text: قُلْ إِنَّمَا الْعِلْمُ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَا أَنَا نَذِيرٌ مُبِينٌ
Verse Translation: Say, "The knowledge is only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner."

Verse Text: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةً سِيئَتْ وُجُوهُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَقِيلَ هَذَا الَّذِي كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تَدَّعُونَ
Verse Translation: But when they see it approaching, the faces of those who disbelieve will be distressed, and it will be said, "This is that for which you used to call."

Verse Text: قُلْ أَرَأَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِيَ اللَّهُ وَمَنْ مَعِيَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَنْ يُجِيرُ الْكَافِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
Verse Translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "Have you considered: whether Allah should cause my death and those with me or have mercy upon us, who can protect the disbelievers from a painful punishment?"

Verse Text: قُلْ هُوَ الرَّحْمَنُ آمَنَّا بِهِ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِي ضَلَالٍ مُبِينٍ
Verse Translation: Say, "He is the Most Merciful; we have believed in Him, and upon Him we have relied. And you will [come to] know who it is that is in clear error."

Verse Text: قُلْ أَرَأَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَاؤُكُمْ غَوْرًا فَمَنْ يَأْتِيكُمْ بِمَاءٍ مَعِينٍ
Verse Translation: Say, "Have you considered: if your water was to become sunken [into the earth], then who could bring you flowing water?"

Verse Text: ن وَالْقَلَمِ وَمَا يَسْطُرُونَ
Verse Translation: Nun. By the pen and what they inscribe,

Verse Text: مَا أَنْتَ بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ بِمَجْنُونٍ
Verse Translation: You are not, [O Muhammad], by the favor of your Lord, a madman.

Verse Text: وَإِنَّ لَكَ لَأَجْرًا غَيْرَ مَمْنُونٍ
Verse Translation: And indeed, for you is a reward uninterrupted.

Verse Text: وَإِنَّكَ لَعَلَى خُلُقٍ عَظِيمٍ
Verse Translation: And indeed, you are of a great moral character.

Verse Text: فَسَتُبْصِرُ وَيُبْصِرُونَ
Verse Translation: So you will see and they will see

Verse Text: بِأَيْيِكُمُ الْمَفْتُونُ
Verse Translation: Which of you is the afflicted [by a devil].

Verse Text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنْ ضَلَّ عَنْ سَبِيلِهِ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِالْمُهْتَدِينَ
Verse Translation: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has gone astray from His way, and He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided.

Verse Text: فَلَا تُطِعِ الْمُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: Then do not obey the deniers.

Verse Text: وَدُّوا لَوْ تُدْهِنُ فَيُدْهِنُونَ
Verse Translation: They wish that you would soften [in your position], so they would soften [toward you].

Verse Text: وَلَا تُطِعْ كُلَّ حَلَّافٍ مَهِينٍ
Verse Translation: And do not obey every worthless habitual swearer

Verse Text: هَمَّازٍ مَشَّاءٍ بِنَمِيمٍ
Verse Translation: [And] scorner, going about with malicious gossip -

Verse Text: مَنَّاعٍ لِلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
Verse Translation: A preventer of good, transgressing and sinful,

Verse Text: عُتُلٍّ بَعْدَ ذَلِكَ زَنِيمٍ
Verse Translation: Cruel, moreover, and an illegitimate pretender.

Verse Text: أَنْ كَانَ ذَا مَالٍ وَبَنِينَ
Verse Translation: Because he is a possessor of wealth and children,

Verse Text: إِذَا تُتْلَى عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
Verse Translation: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

Verse Text: سَنَسِمُهُ عَلَى الْخُرْطُومِ
Verse Translation: We will brand him upon the snout.

Verse Text: إِنَّا بَلَوْنَاهُمْ كَمَا بَلَوْنَا أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ إِذْ أَقْسَمُوا لَيَصْرِمُنَّهَا مُصْبِحِينَ
Verse Translation: Indeed, We have tried them as We tried the companions of the garden, when they swore to cut its fruit in the [early] morning

Verse Text: وَلَا يَسْتَثْنُونَ
Verse Translation: Without making exception.

Verse Text: فَطَافَ عَلَيْهَا طَائِفٌ مِنْ رَبِّكَ وَهُمْ نَائِمُونَ
Verse Translation: So there came upon the garden an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep.

Verse Text: فَأَصْبَحَتْ كَالصَّرِيمِ
Verse Translation: And it became as though reaped.

Verse Text: فَتَنَادَوْا مُصْبِحِينَ
Verse Translation: And they called one another at morning,

Verse Text: أَنِ اغْدُوا عَلَى حَرْثِكُمْ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَارِمِينَ
Verse Translation: [Saying], "Go early to your crop if you would cut the fruit."

Verse Text: فَانْطَلَقُوا وَهُمْ يَتَخَافَتُونَ
Verse Translation: So they set out, while lowering their voices,

Verse Text: أَنْ لَا يَدْخُلَنَّهَا الْيَوْمَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِسْكِينٌ
Verse Translation: [Saying], "There will surely not enter it today upon you [any] poor person."

Verse Text: وَغَدَوْا عَلَى حَرْدٍ قَادِرِينَ
Verse Translation: And they went early in determination, [assuming themselves] able.

Verse Text: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهَا قَالُوا إِنَّا لَضَالُّونَ
Verse Translation: But when they saw it, they said, "Indeed, we are lost;

Verse Text: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ
Verse Translation: Rather, we have been deprived."

Verse Text: قَالَ أَوْسَطُهُمْ أَلَمْ أَقُلْ لَكُمْ لَوْلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ
Verse Translation: The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you, 'Why do you not exalt [Allah]?' "

Verse Text: قَالُوا سُبْحَانَ رَبِّنَا إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَالِمِينَ
Verse Translation: They said, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."

Verse Text: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَى بَعْضٍ يَتَلَاوَمُونَ
Verse Translation: Then they approached one another, blaming each other.

Verse Text: قَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا إِنَّا كُنَّا طَاغِينَ
Verse Translation: They said, "O woe to us; indeed we were transgressors.

Verse Text: عَسَى رَبُّنَا أَنْ يُبْدِلَنَا خَيْرًا مِنْهَا إِنَّا إِلَى رَبِّنَا رَاغِبُونَ
Verse Translation: Perhaps our Lord will substitute for us [one] better than it. Indeed, we are toward our Lord desirous."

Verse Text: كَذَلِكَ الْعَذَابُ وَلَعَذَابُ الْآخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ
Verse Translation: Such is the punishment [of this world]. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.

Verse Text: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتِ النَّعِيمِ
Verse Translation: Indeed, for the righteous with their Lord are the Gardens of Pleasure.

Verse Text: أَفَنَجْعَلُ الْمُسْلِمِينَ كَالْمُجْرِمِينَ
Verse Translation: Then will We treat the Muslims like the criminals?

Verse Text: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
Verse Translation: What is [the matter] with you? How do you judge?

Verse Text: أَمْ لَكُمْ كِتَابٌ فِيهِ تَدْرُسُونَ
Verse Translation: Or do you have a scripture in which you learn

Verse Text: إِنَّ لَكُمْ فِيهِ لَمَا تَخَيَّرُونَ
Verse Translation: That indeed for you is whatever you choose?

Verse Text: أَمْ لَكُمْ أَيْمَانٌ عَلَيْنَا بَالِغَةٌ إِلَى يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ إِنَّ لَكُمْ لَمَا تَحْكُمُونَ
Verse Translation: Or do you have oaths [binding] upon Us, extending until the Day of Resurrection, that indeed for you is whatever you judge?

Verse Text: سَلْهُمْ أَيُّهُمْ بِذَلِكَ زَعِيمٌ
Verse Translation: Ask them which of them, for that [claim], is responsible.

Verse Text: أَمْ لَهُمْ شُرَكَاءُ فَلْيَأْتُوا بِشُرَكَائِهِمْ إِنْ كَانُوا صَادِقِينَ
Verse Translation: Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners, if they should be truthful.

Verse Text: يَوْمَ يُكْشَفُ عَنْ سَاقٍ وَيُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى السُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ
Verse Translation: The Day the shin will be uncovered and they are invited to prostration but the disbelievers will not be able,

Verse Text: خَاشِعَةً أَبْصَارُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ وَقَدْ كَانُوا يُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى السُّجُودِ وَهُمْ سَالِمُونَ
Verse Translation: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. And they used to be invited to prostration while they were sound.

Verse Text: فَذَرْنِي وَمَنْ يُكَذِّبُ بِهَذَا الْحَدِيثِ سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُمْ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
Verse Translation: So leave Me, [O Muhammad], with [the matter of] whoever denies the Qur'an. We will progressively lead them [to punishment] from where they do not know.

Verse Text: وَأُمْلِي لَهُمْ إِنَّ كَيْدِي مَتِينٌ
Verse Translation: And I will give them time. Indeed, My plan is firm.

Verse Text: أَمْ تَسْأَلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُمْ مِنْ مَغْرَمٍ مُثْقَلُونَ
Verse Translation: Or do you ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

Verse Text: أَمْ عِنْدَهُمُ الْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
Verse Translation: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

Verse Text: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُنْ كَصَاحِبِ الْحُوتِ إِذْ نَادَى وَهُوَ مَكْظُومٌ
Verse Translation: Then be patient for the decision of your Lord, [O Muhammad], and be not like the companion of the fish when he called out while he was distressed.

Verse Text: لَوْلَا أَنْ تَدَارَكَهُ نِعْمَةٌ مِنْ رَبِّهِ لَنُبِذَ بِالْعَرَاءِ وَهُوَ مَذْمُومٌ
Verse Translation: If not that a favor from his Lord overtook him, he would have been thrown onto the naked shore while he was censured.

Verse Text: فَاجْتَبَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَجَعَلَهُ مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
Verse Translation: And his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous.

Verse Text: وَإِنْ يَكَادُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَيُزْلِقُونَكَ بِأَبْصَارِهِمْ لَمَّا سَمِعُوا الذِّكْرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُ لَمَجْنُونٌ
Verse Translation: And indeed, those who disbelieve would almost make you slip with their eyes when they hear the message, and they say, "Indeed, he is mad."

Verse Text: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِلْعَالَمِينَ
Verse Translation: But it is not except a reminder to the worlds.

Verse Text: الْحَاقَّةُ
Verse Translation: The Inevitable Reality -

Verse Text: مَا الْحَاقَّةُ
Verse Translation: What is the Inevitable Reality?

Verse Text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحَاقَّةُ
Verse Translation: And what can make you know what is the Inevitable Reality?

Verse Text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ وَعَادٌ بِالْقَارِعَةِ
Verse Translation: Thamud and 'Aad denied the Striking Calamity.

Verse Text: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهْلِكُوا بِالطَّاغِيَةِ
Verse Translation: So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast].

Verse Text: وَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَأُهْلِكُوا بِرِيحٍ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ
Verse Translation: And as for 'Aad, they were destroyed by a screaming, violent wind

Verse Text: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍ وَثَمَانِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًا فَتَرَى الْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَى كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ
Verse Translation: Which Allah imposed upon them for seven nights and eight days in succession, so you would see the people therein fallen as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees.

Verse Text: فَهَلْ تَرَى لَهُمْ مِنْ بَاقِيَةٍ
Verse Translation: Then do you see of them any remains?

Verse Text: وَجَاءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَنْ قَبْلَهُ وَالْمُؤْتَفِكَاتُ بِالْخَاطِئَةِ
Verse Translation: And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin.

Verse Text: فَعَصَوْا رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَةً رَابِيَةً
Verse Translation: And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding [in severity].

Verse Text: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَى الْمَاءُ حَمَلْنَاكُمْ فِي الْجَارِيَةِ
Verse Translation: Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship

Verse Text: لِنَجْعَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَةً وَتَعِيَهَا أُذُنٌ وَاعِيَةٌ
Verse Translation: That We might make it for you a reminder and [that] a conscious ear would be conscious of it.

Verse Text: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
Verse Translation: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast

Verse Text: وَحُمِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ وَالْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةً وَاحِدَةً
Verse Translation: And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow -

Verse Text: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ وَقَعَتِ الْوَاقِعَةُ
Verse Translation: Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur,

Verse Text: وَانْشَقَّتِ السَّمَاءُ فَهِيَ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاهِيَةٌ
Verse Translation: And the heaven will split [open], for that Day it is infirm.

Verse Text: وَالْمَلَكُ عَلَى أَرْجَائِهَا وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ ثَمَانِيَةٌ
Verse Translation: And the angels are at its edges. And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day, eight [of them].

Verse Text: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَى مِنْكُمْ خَافِيَةٌ
Verse Translation: That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed.

Verse Text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ فَيَقُولُ هَاؤُمُ اقْرَءُوا كِتَابِيَهْ
Verse Translation: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record!

Verse Text: إِنِّي ظَنَنْتُ أَنِّي مُلَاقٍ حِسَابِيَهْ
Verse Translation: Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account."

Verse Text: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَاضِيَةٍ
Verse Translation: So he will be in a pleasant life -

Verse Text: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
Verse Translation: In an elevated garden,

Verse Text: قُطُوفُهَا دَانِيَةٌ
Verse Translation: Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near.

Verse Text: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِي الْأَيَّامِ الْخَالِيَةِ
Verse Translation: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you put forth in the days past."

Verse Text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِشِمَالِهِ فَيَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَابِيَهْ
Verse Translation: But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "Oh, I wish I had not been given my record

Verse Text: وَلَمْ أَدْرِ مَا حِسَابِيَهْ
Verse Translation: And had not known what is my account.

Verse Text: يَا لَيْتَهَا كَانَتِ الْقَاضِيَةَ
Verse Translation: I wish my death had been the decisive one.

Verse Text: مَا أَغْنَى عَنِّي مَالِيَهْ
Verse Translation: My wealth has not availed me.

Verse Text: هَلَكَ عَنِّي سُلْطَانِيَهْ
Verse Translation: Gone from me is my authority."

Verse Text: خُذُوهُ فَغُلُّوهُ
Verse Translation: [Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ الْجَحِيمَ صَلُّوهُ
Verse Translation: Then into Hellfire drive him.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ فِي سِلْسِلَةٍ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًا فَاسْلُكُوهُ
Verse Translation: Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him."

Verse Text: إِنَّهُ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ
Verse Translation: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great,

Verse Text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَى طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
Verse Translation: Nor did he encourage the feeding of the poor.

Verse Text: فَلَيْسَ لَهُ الْيَوْمَ هَاهُنَا حَمِيمٌ
Verse Translation: So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend

Verse Text: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنْ غِسْلِينٍ
Verse Translation: Nor any food except from the discharge of wounds;

Verse Text: لَا يَأْكُلُهُ إِلَّا الْخَاطِئُونَ
Verse Translation: None will eat it except the sinners.

Verse Text: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِمَا تُبْصِرُونَ
Verse Translation: So I swear by what you see

Verse Text: وَمَا لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
Verse Translation: And what you do not see

Verse Text: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
Verse Translation: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is the word of a noble Messenger.

Verse Text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ قَلِيلًا مَا تُؤْمِنُونَ
Verse Translation: And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe.

Verse Text: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ قَلِيلًا مَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
Verse Translation: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember.

Verse Text: تَنْزِيلٌ مِنْ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
Verse Translation: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.

Verse Text: وَلَوْ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيْنَا بَعْضَ الْأَقَاوِيلِ
Verse Translation: And if Muhammad had made up about Us some [false] sayings,

Verse Text: لَأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُ بِالْيَمِينِ
Verse Translation: We would have seized him by the right hand;

Verse Text: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعْنَا مِنْهُ الْوَتِينَ
Verse Translation: Then We would have cut from him the aorta.

Verse Text: فَمَا مِنْكُمْ مِنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَاجِزِينَ
Verse Translation: And there is no one of you who could prevent [Us] from him.

Verse Text: وَإِنَّهُ لَتَذْكِرَةٌ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
Verse Translation: And indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder for the righteous.

Verse Text: وَإِنَّا لَنَعْلَمُ أَنَّ مِنْكُمْ مُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: And indeed, We know that among you are deniers.

Verse Text: وَإِنَّهُ لَحَسْرَةٌ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ
Verse Translation: And indeed, it will be [a cause of] regret upon the disbelievers.

Verse Text: وَإِنَّهُ لَحَقُّ الْيَقِينِ
Verse Translation: And indeed, it is the truth of certainty.

Verse Text: فَسَبِّحْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الْعَظِيمِ
Verse Translation: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

Verse Text: سَأَلَ سَائِلٌ بِعَذَابٍ وَاقِعٍ
Verse Translation: A supplicant asked for a punishment bound to happen

Verse Text: لِلْكَافِرِينَ لَيْسَ لَهُ دَافِعٌ
Verse Translation: To the disbelievers; of it there is no preventer.

Verse Text: مِنَ اللَّهِ ذِي الْمَعَارِجِ
Verse Translation: [It is] from Allah, owner of the ways of ascent.

Verse Text: تَعْرُجُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِي يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
Verse Translation: The angels and the Spirit will ascend to Him during a Day the extent of which is fifty thousand years.

Verse Text: فَاصْبِرْ صَبْرًا جَمِيلًا
Verse Translation: So be patient with gracious patience.

Verse Text: إِنَّهُمْ يَرَوْنَهُ بَعِيدًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, they see it [as] distant,

Verse Text: وَنَرَاهُ قَرِيبًا
Verse Translation: But We see it [as] near.

Verse Text: يَوْمَ تَكُونُ السَّمَاءُ كَالْمُهْلِ
Verse Translation: On the Day the sky will be like murky oil,

Verse Text: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ
Verse Translation: And the mountains will be like wool,

Verse Text: وَلَا يَسْأَلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيمًا
Verse Translation: And no friend will ask [anything of] a friend,

Verse Text: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ يَوَدُّ الْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِي مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍ بِبَنِيهِ
Verse Translation: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish that he could be ransomed from the punishment of that Day by his children

Verse Text: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَأَخِيهِ
Verse Translation: And his wife and his brother

Verse Text: وَفَصِيلَتِهِ الَّتِي تُؤْوِيهِ
Verse Translation: And his nearest kindred who shelter him

Verse Text: وَمَنْ فِي الْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنْجِيهِ
Verse Translation: And whoever is on earth entirely [so] then it could save him.

Verse Text: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا لَظَى
Verse Translation: No! Indeed, it is the Flame [of Hell],

Verse Text: نَزَّاعَةً لِلشَّوَى
Verse Translation: A remover of exteriors.

Verse Text: تَدْعُو مَنْ أَدْبَرَ وَتَوَلَّى
Verse Translation: It invites he who turned his back [on truth] and went away [from obedience]

Verse Text: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوْعَى
Verse Translation: And collected [wealth] and hoarded.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الْإِنْسَانَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, mankind was created anxious:

Verse Text: إِذَا مَسَّهُ الشَّرُّ جَزُوعًا
Verse Translation: When evil touches him, impatient,

Verse Text: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ الْخَيْرُ مَنُوعًا
Verse Translation: And when good touches him, withholding [of it],

Verse Text: إِلَّا الْمُصَلِّينَ
Verse Translation: Except the observers of prayer -

Verse Text: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَى صَلَاتِهِمْ دَائِمُونَ
Verse Translation: Those who are constant in their prayer

Verse Text: وَالَّذِينَ فِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ مَعْلُومٌ
Verse Translation: And those within whose wealth is a known right

Verse Text: لِلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
Verse Translation: For the petitioner and the deprived -

Verse Text: وَالَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
Verse Translation: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense

Verse Text: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ مِنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِمْ مُشْفِقُونَ
Verse Translation: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord -

Verse Text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمْ غَيْرُ مَأْمُونٍ
Verse Translation: Indeed, the punishment of their Lord is not that from which one is safe -

Verse Text: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَافِظُونَ
Verse Translation: And those who guard their private parts

Verse Text: إِلَّا عَلَى أَزْوَاجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
Verse Translation: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they are not to be blamed -

Verse Text: فَمَنِ ابْتَغَى وَرَاءَ ذَلِكَ فَأُولَئِكَ هُمُ الْعَادُونَ
Verse Translation: But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors -

Verse Text: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَانَاتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَاعُونَ
Verse Translation: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive

Verse Text: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ بِشَهَادَاتِهِمْ قَائِمُونَ
Verse Translation: And those who are in their testimonies upright

Verse Text: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَى صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
Verse Translation: And those who [carefully] maintain their prayer:

Verse Text: أُولَئِكَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ مُكْرَمُونَ
Verse Translation: They will be in gardens, honored.

Verse Text: فَمَالِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا قِبَلَكَ مُهْطِعِينَ
Verse Translation: So what is [the matter] with those who disbelieve, hastening [from] before you, [O Muhammad],

Verse Text: عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ عِزِينَ
Verse Translation: [To sit] on [your] right and [your] left in separate groups?

Verse Text: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِنْهُمْ أَنْ يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
Verse Translation: Does every person among them aspire to enter a garden of pleasure?

Verse Text: كَلَّا إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُمْ مِمَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
Verse Translation: No! Indeed, We have created them from that which they know.

Verse Text: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ الْمَشَارِقِ وَالْمَغَارِبِ إِنَّا لَقَادِرُونَ
Verse Translation: So I swear by the Lord of [all] risings and settings that indeed We are able

Verse Text: عَلَى أَنْ نُبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
Verse Translation: To replace them with better than them; and We are not to be outdone.

Verse Text: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا وَيَلْعَبُوا حَتَّى يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
Verse Translation: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised -

Verse Text: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَى نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
Verse Translation: The Day they will emerge from the graves rapidly as if they were, toward an erected idol, hastening.

Verse Text: خَاشِعَةً أَبْصَارُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ذَلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الَّذِي كَانُوا يُوعَدُونَ
Verse Translation: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. That is the Day which they had been promised.

Verse Text: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَى قَوْمِهِ أَنْ أَنْذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِنْ قَبْلِ أَنْ يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."

Verse Text: قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ إِنِّي لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُبِينٌ
Verse Translation: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner,

Verse Text: أَنِ اعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَاتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
Verse Translation: [Saying], 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me.

Verse Text: يَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ مِنْ ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَى أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى إِنَّ أَجَلَ اللَّهِ إِذَا جَاءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ لَوْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
Verse Translation: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allah, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew.' "

Verse Text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِي لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
Verse Translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.

Verse Text: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَائِي إِلَّا فِرَارًا
Verse Translation: But my invitation increased them not except in flight.

Verse Text: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوا أَصَابِعَهُمْ فِي آذَانِهِمْ وَاسْتَغْشَوْا ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا اسْتِكْبَارًا
Verse Translation: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
Verse Translation: Then I invited them publicly.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْلَنْتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
Verse Translation: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

Verse Text: فَقُلْتُ اسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
Verse Translation: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.

Verse Text: يُرْسِلِ السَّمَاءَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِدْرَارًا
Verse Translation: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

Verse Text: وَيُمْدِدْكُمْ بِأَمْوَالٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَلْ لَكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَيَجْعَلْ لَكُمْ أَنْهَارًا
Verse Translation: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.

Verse Text: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
Verse Translation: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur

Verse Text: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
Verse Translation: While He has created you in stages?

Verse Text: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا كَيْفَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا
Verse Translation: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers

Verse Text: وَجَعَلَ الْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ الشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
Verse Translation: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?

Verse Text: وَاللَّهُ أَنْبَتَكُمْ مِنَ الْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
Verse Translation: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
Verse Translation: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.

Verse Text: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
Verse Translation: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse

Verse Text: لِتَسْلُكُوا مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
Verse Translation: That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "

Verse Text: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِي وَاتَّبَعُوا مَنْ لَمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُ وَوَلَدُهُ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
Verse Translation: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.

Verse Text: وَمَكَرُوا مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
Verse Translation: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.

Verse Text: وَقَالُوا لَا تَذَرُنَّ آلِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
Verse Translation: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.

Verse Text: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا كَثِيرًا وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَالًا
Verse Translation: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."

Verse Text: مِمَّا خَطِيئَاتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا فَأُدْخِلُوا نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا لَهُمْ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ أَنْصَارًا
Verse Translation: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.

Verse Text: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
Verse Translation: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.

Verse Text: إِنَّكَ إِنْ تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوا إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.

Verse Text: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَنْ دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًا
Verse Translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."

Verse Text: قُلْ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ اسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِنَ الْجِنِّ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْآنًا عَجَبًا
Verse Translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an.

Verse Text: يَهْدِي إِلَى الرُّشْدِ فَآمَنَّا بِهِ وَلَنْ نُشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَا أَحَدًا
Verse Translation: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.

Verse Text: وَأَنَّهُ تَعَالَى جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا اتَّخَذَ صَاحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
Verse Translation: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son

Verse Text: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى اللَّهِ شَطَطًا
Verse Translation: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression.

Verse Text: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَنْ لَنْ تَقُولَ الْإِنْسُ وَالْجِنُّ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا
Verse Translation: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie.

Verse Text: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِنَ الْإِنْسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِنَ الْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
Verse Translation: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden.

Verse Text: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا كَمَا ظَنَنْتُمْ أَنْ لَنْ يَبْعَثَ اللَّهُ أَحَدًا
Verse Translation: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger].

Verse Text: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا السَّمَاءَ فَوَجَدْنَاهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
Verse Translation: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.

Verse Text: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَاعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ فَمَنْ يَسْتَمِعِ الْآنَ يَجِدْ لَهُ شِهَابًا رَصَدًا
Verse Translation: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him.

Verse Text: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِي أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَنْ فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
Verse Translation: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.

Verse Text: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الصَّالِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَلِكَ كُنَّا طَرَائِقَ قِدَدًا
Verse Translation: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways.

Verse Text: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَنْ لَنْ نُعْجِزَ اللَّهَ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَنْ نُعْجِزَهُ هَرَبًا
Verse Translation: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.

Verse Text: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا الْهُدَى آمَنَّا بِهِ فَمَنْ يُؤْمِنْ بِرَبِّهِ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
Verse Translation: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden.

Verse Text: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُولَئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا رَشَدًا
Verse Translation: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course.

Verse Text: وَأَمَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
Verse Translation: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood.'

Verse Text: وَأَنْ لَوِ اسْتَقَامُوا عَلَى الطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَاهُمْ مَاءً غَدَقًا
Verse Translation: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision

Verse Text: لِنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ وَمَنْ يُعْرِضْ عَنْ ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
Verse Translation: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment.

Verse Text: وَأَنَّ الْمَسَاجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ أَحَدًا
Verse Translation: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.

Verse Text: وَأَنَّهُ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ اللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
Verse Translation: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."

Verse Text: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَدْعُو رَبِّي وَلَا أُشْرِكُ بِهِ أَحَدًا
Verse Translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."

Verse Text: قُلْ إِنِّي لَا أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
Verse Translation: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."

Verse Text: قُلْ إِنِّي لَنْ يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ اللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِنْ دُونِهِ مُلْتَحَدًا
Verse Translation: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.

Verse Text: إِلَّا بَلَاغًا مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرِسَالَاتِهِ وَمَنْ يَعْصِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ فَإِنَّ لَهُ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا
Verse Translation: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.

Verse Text: حَتَّى إِذَا رَأَوْا مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
Verse Translation: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number.

Verse Text: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِي أَقَرِيبٌ مَا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُ رَبِّي أَمَدًا
Verse Translation: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."

Verse Text: عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَى غَيْبِهِ أَحَدًا
Verse Translation: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone

Verse Text: إِلَّا مَنِ ارْتَضَى مِنْ رَسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُ يَسْلُكُ مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِ رَصَدًا
Verse Translation: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers

Verse Text: لِيَعْلَمَ أَنْ قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا رِسَالَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَى كُلَّ شَيْءٍ عَدَدًا
Verse Translation: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُزَّمِّلُ
Verse Translation: O you who wraps himself [in clothing],

Verse Text: قُمِ اللَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
Verse Translation: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little -

Verse Text: نِصْفَهُ أَوِ انْقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
Verse Translation: Half of it - or subtract from it a little

Verse Text: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ الْقُرْآنَ تَرْتِيلًا
Verse Translation: Or add to it, and recite the Qur'an with measured recitation.

Verse Text: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِي عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word.

Verse Text: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ اللَّيْلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطْئًا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence [of heart and tongue] and more suitable for words.

Verse Text: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي النَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation.

Verse Text: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
Verse Translation: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion.

Verse Text: رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَاتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا
Verse Translation: [He is] the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of [your] affairs.

Verse Text: وَاصْبِرْ عَلَى مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا
Verse Translation: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance.

Verse Text: وَذَرْنِي وَالْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُولِي النَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
Verse Translation: And leave Me with [the matter of] the deniers, those of ease [in life], and allow them respite a little.

Verse Text: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَا أَنْكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire

Verse Text: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
Verse Translation: And food that chokes and a painful punishment -

Verse Text: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الْأَرْضُ وَالْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ الْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَهِيلًا
Verse Translation: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down.

Verse Text: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَاهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَى فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.

Verse Text: فَعَصَى فِرْعَوْنُ الرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَاهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا
Verse Translation: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure.

Verse Text: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِنْ كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ الْوِلْدَانَ شِيبًا
Verse Translation: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white- haired?

Verse Text: السَّمَاءُ مُنْفَطِرٌ بِهِ كَانَ وَعْدُهُ مَفْعُولًا
Verse Translation: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled.

Verse Text: إِنَّ هَذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ فَمَنْ شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَى رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way.

Verse Text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَى مِنْ ثُلُثَيِ اللَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُ وَثُلُثَهُ وَطَائِفَةٌ مِنَ الَّذِينَ مَعَكَ وَاللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ عَلِمَ أَنْ لَنْ تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ عَلِمَ أَنْ سَيَكُونُ مِنْكُمْ مَرْضَى وَآخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِنْ فَضْلِ اللَّهِ وَآخَرُونَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا لِأَنْفُسِكُمْ مِنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا وَاسْتَغْفِرُوا اللَّهَ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed, your Lord knows, [O Muhammad], that you stand [in prayer] almost two thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and [so do] a group of those with you. And Allah determines [the extent of] the night and the day. He has known that you [Muslims] will not be able to do it and has turned to you in forgiveness, so recite what is easy [for you] of the Qur'an. He has known that there will be among you those who are ill and others traveling throughout the land seeking [something] of the bounty of Allah and others fighting for the cause of Allah. So recite what is easy from it and establish prayer and give zakah and loan Allah a goodly loan. And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah. It is better and greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُدَّثِّرُ
Verse Translation: O you who covers himself [with a garment],

Verse Text: قُمْ فَأَنْذِرْ
Verse Translation: Arise and warn

Verse Text: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
Verse Translation: And your Lord glorify

Verse Text: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
Verse Translation: And your clothing purify

Verse Text: وَالرُّجْزَ فَاهْجُرْ
Verse Translation: And uncleanliness avoid

Verse Text: وَلَا تَمْنُنْ تَسْتَكْثِرُ
Verse Translation: And do not confer favor to acquire more

Verse Text: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَاصْبِرْ
Verse Translation: But for your Lord be patient.

Verse Text: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي النَّاقُورِ
Verse Translation: And when the trumpet is blown,

Verse Text: فَذَلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
Verse Translation: That Day will be a difficult day

Verse Text: عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ
Verse Translation: For the disbelievers - not easy.

Verse Text: ذَرْنِي وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا
Verse Translation: Leave Me with the one I created alone

Verse Text: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُ مَالًا مَمْدُودًا
Verse Translation: And to whom I granted extensive wealth

Verse Text: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا
Verse Translation: And children present [with him]

Verse Text: وَمَهَّدْتُ لَهُ تَمْهِيدًا
Verse Translation: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life].

Verse Text: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
Verse Translation: Then he desires that I should add more.

Verse Text: كَلَّا إِنَّهُ كَانَ لِآيَاتِنَا عَنِيدًا
Verse Translation: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate.

Verse Text: سَأُرْهِقُهُ صَعُودًا
Verse Translation: I will cover him with arduous torment.

Verse Text: إِنَّهُ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
Verse Translation: Indeed, he thought and deliberated.

Verse Text: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
Verse Translation: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
Verse Translation: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
Verse Translation: Then he considered [again];

Verse Text: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
Verse Translation: Then he frowned and scowled;

Verse Text: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ
Verse Translation: Then he turned back and was arrogant

Verse Text: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
Verse Translation: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].

Verse Text: إِنْ هَذَا إِلَّا قَوْلُ الْبَشَرِ
Verse Translation: This is not but the word of a human being."

Verse Text: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
Verse Translation: I will drive him into Saqar.

Verse Text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سَقَرُ
Verse Translation: And what can make you know what is Saqar?

Verse Text: لَا تُبْقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ
Verse Translation: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned],

Verse Text: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِلْبَشَرِ
Verse Translation: Blackening the skins.

Verse Text: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
Verse Translation: Over it are nineteen [angels].

Verse Text: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا أَصْحَابَ النَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَائِكَةً وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَيَزْدَادَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِيمَانًا وَلَا يَرْتَابَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ وَلِيَقُولَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ مَرَضٌ وَالْكَافِرُونَ مَاذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِهَذَا مَثَلًا كَذَلِكَ يُضِلُّ اللَّهُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَنْ يَشَاءُ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَى لِلْبَشَرِ
Verse Translation: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity.

Verse Text: كَلَّا وَالْقَمَرِ
Verse Translation: No! By the moon

Verse Text: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
Verse Translation: And [by] the night when it departs

Verse Text: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا أَسْفَرَ
Verse Translation: And [by] the morning when it brightens,

Verse Text: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى الْكُبَرِ
Verse Translation: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]

Verse Text: نَذِيرًا لِلْبَشَرِ
Verse Translation: As a warning to humanity -

Verse Text: لِمَنْ شَاءَ مِنْكُمْ أَنْ يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
Verse Translation: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.

Verse Text: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
Verse Translation: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained

Verse Text: إِلَّا أَصْحَابَ الْيَمِينِ
Verse Translation: Except the companions of the right,

Verse Text: فِي جَنَّاتٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
Verse Translation: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other

Verse Text: عَنِ الْمُجْرِمِينَ
Verse Translation: About the criminals,

Verse Text: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِي سَقَرَ
Verse Translation: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"

Verse Text: قَالُوا لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ الْمُصَلِّينَ
Verse Translation: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,

Verse Text: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ الْمِسْكِينَ
Verse Translation: Nor did we used to feed the poor.

Verse Text: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ الْخَائِضِينَ
Verse Translation: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],

Verse Text: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
Verse Translation: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense

Verse Text: حَتَّى أَتَانَا الْيَقِينُ
Verse Translation: Until there came to us the certainty."

Verse Text: فَمَا تَنْفَعُهُمْ شَفَاعَةُ الشَّافِعِينَ
Verse Translation: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.

Verse Text: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ التَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
Verse Translation: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away

Verse Text: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُسْتَنْفِرَةٌ
Verse Translation: As if they were alarmed donkeys

Verse Text: فَرَّتْ مِنْ قَسْوَرَةٍ
Verse Translation: Fleeing from a lion?

Verse Text: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِنْهُمْ أَنْ يُؤْتَى صُحُفًا مُنَشَّرَةً
Verse Translation: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.

Verse Text: كَلَّا بَلْ لَا يَخَافُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
Verse Translation: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.

Verse Text: كَلَّا إِنَّهُ تَذْكِرَةٌ
Verse Translation: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder

Verse Text: فَمَنْ شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
Verse Translation: Then whoever wills will remember it.

Verse Text: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ هُوَ أَهْلُ التَّقْوَى وَأَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ
Verse Translation: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.

Verse Text: لَا أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
Verse Translation: I swear by the Day of Resurrection

Verse Text: وَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالنَّفْسِ اللَّوَّامَةِ
Verse Translation: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection].

Verse Text: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنْسَانُ أَلَّنْ نَجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُ
Verse Translation: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones?

Verse Text: بَلَى قَادِرِينَ عَلَى أَنْ نُسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُ
Verse Translation: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips.

Verse Text: بَلْ يُرِيدُ الْإِنْسَانُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُ
Verse Translation: But man desires to continue in sin.

Verse Text: يَسْأَلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الْقِيَامَةِ
Verse Translation: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"

Verse Text: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ الْبَصَرُ
Verse Translation: So when vision is dazzled

Verse Text: وَخَسَفَ الْقَمَرُ
Verse Translation: And the moon darkens

Verse Text: وَجُمِعَ الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ
Verse Translation: And the sun and the moon are joined,

Verse Text: يَقُولُ الْإِنْسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ الْمَفَرُّ
Verse Translation: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape?"

Verse Text: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
Verse Translation: No! There is no refuge.

Verse Text: إِلَى رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمُسْتَقَرُّ
Verse Translation: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence.

Verse Text: يُنَبَّأُ الْإِنْسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
Verse Translation: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back.

Verse Text: بَلِ الْإِنْسَانُ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ بَصِيرَةٌ
Verse Translation: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness,

Verse Text: وَلَوْ أَلْقَى مَعَاذِيرَهُ
Verse Translation: Even if he presents his excuses.

Verse Text: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِ
Verse Translation: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muhammad], to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an.

Verse Text: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ وَقُرْآنَهُ
Verse Translation: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.

Verse Text: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ فَاتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ
Verse Translation: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُ
Verse Translation: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].

Verse Text: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ
Verse Translation: No! But you love the immediate

Verse Text: وَتَذَرُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
Verse Translation: And leave the Hereafter.

Verse Text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَاضِرَةٌ
Verse Translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant,

Verse Text: إِلَى رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ
Verse Translation: Looking at their Lord.

Verse Text: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ بَاسِرَةٌ
Verse Translation: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted,

Verse Text: تَظُنُّ أَنْ يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ
Verse Translation: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking.

Verse Text: كَلَّا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ التَّرَاقِيَ
Verse Translation: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones

Verse Text: وَقِيلَ مَنْ رَاقٍ
Verse Translation: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]?"

Verse Text: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ الْفِرَاقُ
Verse Translation: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation

Verse Text: وَالْتَفَّتِ السَّاقُ بِالسَّاقِ
Verse Translation: And the leg is wound about the leg,

Verse Text: إِلَى رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمَسَاقُ
Verse Translation: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession.

Verse Text: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّى
Verse Translation: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed.

Verse Text: وَلَكِنْ كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّى
Verse Translation: But [instead], he denied and turned away.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَى أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّى
Verse Translation: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride].

Verse Text: أَوْلَى لَكَ فَأَوْلَى
Verse Translation: Woe to you, and woe!

Verse Text: ثُمَّ أَوْلَى لَكَ فَأَوْلَى
Verse Translation: Then woe to you, and woe!

Verse Text: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنْسَانُ أَنْ يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
Verse Translation: Does man think that he will be left neglected?

Verse Text: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِنْ مَنِيٍّ يُمْنَى
Verse Translation: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?

Verse Text: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّى
Verse Translation: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]

Verse Text: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنْثَى
Verse Translation: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.

Verse Text: أَلَيْسَ ذَلِكَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَى أَنْ يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَى
Verse Translation: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead?

Verse Text: هَلْ أَتَى عَلَى الْإِنْسَانِ حِينٌ مِنَ الدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُنْ شَيْئًا مَذْكُورًا
Verse Translation: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?

Verse Text: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.

Verse Text: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.

Verse Text: إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَلَاسِلَ وَأَغْلَالًا وَسَعِيرًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِنْ كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur,

Verse Text: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
Verse Translation: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].

Verse Text: يُوفُونَ بِالنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيرًا
Verse Translation: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.

Verse Text: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَى حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
Verse Translation: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,

Verse Text: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنْكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
Verse Translation: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.

Verse Text: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِنْ رَبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."

Verse Text: فَوَقَاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَلِكَ الْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّاهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
Verse Translation: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness

Verse Text: وَجَزَاهُمْ بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
Verse Translation: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].

Verse Text: مُتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
Verse Translation: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.

Verse Text: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَالُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
Verse Translation: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.

Verse Text: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِمْ بِآنِيَةٍ مِنْ فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا
Verse Translation: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],

Verse Text: قَوَارِيرَ مِنْ فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
Verse Translation: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.

Verse Text: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنْجَبِيلًا
Verse Translation: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger

Verse Text: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّى سَلْسَبِيلًا
Verse Translation: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel.

Verse Text: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَنْثُورًا
Verse Translation: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.

Verse Text: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
Verse Translation: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.

Verse Text: عَالِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُنْدُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ وَحُلُّوا أَسَاوِرَ مِنْ فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
Verse Translation: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.

Verse Text: إِنَّ هَذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَاءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُمْ مَشْكُورًا
Verse Translation: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."

Verse Text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ تَنْزِيلًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.

Verse Text: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ آثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
Verse Translation: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].

Verse Text: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
Verse Translation: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening

Verse Text: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاسْجُدْ لَهُ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
Verse Translation: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night.

Verse Text: إِنَّ هَؤُلَاءِ يُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَاءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.

Verse Text: نَحْنُ خَلَقْنَاهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَا أَسْرَهُمْ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَا أَمْثَالَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
Verse Translation: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.

Verse Text: إِنَّ هَذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ فَمَنْ شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَى رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.

Verse Text: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
Verse Translation: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.

Verse Text: يُدْخِلُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ وَالظَّالِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
Verse Translation: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.

Verse Text: وَالْمُرْسَلَاتِ عُرْفًا
Verse Translation: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts

Verse Text: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا
Verse Translation: And the winds that blow violently

Verse Text: وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْرًا
Verse Translation: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]

Verse Text: فَالْفَارِقَاتِ فَرْقًا
Verse Translation: And those [angels] who bring criterion

Verse Text: فَالْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
Verse Translation: And those [angels] who deliver a message

Verse Text: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
Verse Translation: As justification or warning,

Verse Text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَاقِعٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.

Verse Text: فَإِذَا النُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
Verse Translation: So when the stars are obliterated

Verse Text: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ فُرِجَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the heaven is opened

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the mountains are blown away

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the messengers' time has come...

Verse Text: لِأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
Verse Translation: For what Day was it postponed?

Verse Text: لِيَوْمِ الْفَصْلِ
Verse Translation: For the Day of Judgement.

Verse Text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ
Verse Translation: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?

Verse Text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Verse Text: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ الْأَوَّلِينَ
Verse Translation: Did We not destroy the former peoples?

Verse Text: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ الْآخِرِينَ
Verse Translation: Then We will follow them with the later ones.

Verse Text: كَذَلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
Verse Translation: Thus do We deal with the criminals.

Verse Text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Verse Text: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقْكُمْ مِنْ مَاءٍ مَهِينٍ
Verse Translation: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained?

Verse Text: فَجَعَلْنَاهُ فِي قَرَارٍ مَكِينٍ
Verse Translation: And We placed it in a firm lodging

Verse Text: إِلَى قَدَرٍ مَعْلُومٍ
Verse Translation: For a known extent.

Verse Text: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ الْقَادِرُونَ
Verse Translation: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine.

Verse Text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Verse Text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
Verse Translation: Have We not made the earth a container

Verse Text: أَحْيَاءً وَأَمْوَاتًا
Verse Translation: Of the living and the dead?

Verse Text: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ شَامِخَاتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَاكُمْ مَاءً فُرَاتًا
Verse Translation: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water.

Verse Text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Verse Text: انْطَلِقُوا إِلَى مَا كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
Verse Translation: [They will be told], "Proceed to that which you used to deny.

Verse Text: انْطَلِقُوا إِلَى ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلَاثِ شُعَبٍ
Verse Translation: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns

Verse Text: لَا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنَ اللَّهَبِ
Verse Translation: [But having] no cool shade and availing not against the flame."

Verse Text: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِي بِشَرَرٍ كَالْقَصْرِ
