Verse Translation: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress,

Verse Text: كَأَنَّهُ جِمَالَتٌ صُفْرٌ
Verse Translation: As if they were yellowish [black] camels.

Verse Text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Verse Text: هَذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنْطِقُونَ
Verse Translation: This is a Day they will not speak,

Verse Text: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
Verse Translation: Nor will it be permitted for them to make an excuse.

Verse Text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Verse Text: هَذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ جَمَعْنَاكُمْ وَالْأَوَّلِينَ
Verse Translation: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples.

Verse Text: فَإِنْ كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
Verse Translation: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.

Verse Text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَالٍ وَعُيُونٍ
Verse Translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs

Verse Text: وَفَوَاكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
Verse Translation: And fruits from whatever they desire,

Verse Text: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
Verse Translation: [Being told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

Verse Text: إِنَّا كَذَلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
Verse Translation: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

Verse Text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Verse Text: كُلُوا وَتَمَتَّعُوا قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُمْ مُجْرِمُونَ
Verse Translation: [O disbelievers], eat and enjoy yourselves a little; indeed, you are criminals.

Verse Text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Verse Text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ارْكَعُوا لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
Verse Translation: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.

Verse Text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

Verse Text: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ
Verse Translation: Then in what statement after the Qur'an will they believe?

Verse Text: عَمَّ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
Verse Translation: About what are they asking one another?

Verse Text: عَنِ النَّبَإِ الْعَظِيمِ
Verse Translation: About the great news -

Verse Text: الَّذِي هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
Verse Translation: That over which they are in disagreement.

Verse Text: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
Verse Translation: No! They are going to know.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
Verse Translation: Then, no! They are going to know.

Verse Text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا
Verse Translation: Have We not made the earth a resting place?

Verse Text: وَالْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
Verse Translation: And the mountains as stakes?

Verse Text: وَخَلَقْنَاكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا
Verse Translation: And We created you in pairs

Verse Text: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
Verse Translation: And made your sleep [a means for] rest

Verse Text: وَجَعَلْنَا اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
Verse Translation: And made the night as clothing

Verse Text: وَجَعَلْنَا النَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
Verse Translation: And made the day for livelihood

Verse Text: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
Verse Translation: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]

Verse Text: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
Verse Translation: And made [therein] a burning lamp

Verse Text: وَأَنْزَلْنَا مِنَ الْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَاءً ثَجَّاجًا
Verse Translation: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water

Verse Text: لِنُخْرِجَ بِهِ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
Verse Translation: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation

Verse Text: وَجَنَّاتٍ أَلْفَافًا
Verse Translation: And gardens of entwined growth.

Verse Text: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَاتًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -

Verse Text: يَوْمَ يُنْفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
Verse Translation: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes

Verse Text: وَفُتِحَتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَابًا
Verse Translation: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways

Verse Text: وَسُيِّرَتِ الْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
Verse Translation: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.

Verse Text: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait

Verse Text: لِلطَّاغِينَ مَآبًا
Verse Translation: For the transgressors, a place of return,

Verse Text: لَابِثِينَ فِيهَا أَحْقَابًا
Verse Translation: In which they will remain for ages [unending].

Verse Text: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
Verse Translation: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink

Verse Text: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
Verse Translation: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -

Verse Text: جَزَاءً وِفَاقًا
Verse Translation: An appropriate recompense.

Verse Text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, they were not expecting an account

Verse Text: وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كِذَّابًا
Verse Translation: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.

Verse Text: وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ كِتَابًا
Verse Translation: But all things We have enumerated in writing.

Verse Text: فَذُوقُوا فَلَنْ نَزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
Verse Translation: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."

Verse Text: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -

Verse Text: حَدَائِقَ وَأَعْنَابًا
Verse Translation: Gardens and grapevines

Verse Text: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
Verse Translation: And full-breasted [companions] of equal age

Verse Text: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
Verse Translation: And a full cup.

Verse Text: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّابًا
Verse Translation: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -

Verse Text: جَزَاءً مِنْ رَبِّكَ عَطَاءً حِسَابًا
Verse Translation: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,

Verse Text: رَبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الرَّحْمَنِ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
Verse Translation: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech.

Verse Text: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا لَا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
Verse Translation: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.

Verse Text: ذَلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الْحَقُّ فَمَنْ شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَى رَبِّهِ مَآبًا
Verse Translation: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.

Verse Text: إِنَّا أَنْذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنْظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنْتُ تُرَابًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"

Verse Text: وَالنَّازِعَاتِ غَرْقًا
Verse Translation: By those [angels] who extract with violence

Verse Text: وَالنَّاشِطَاتِ نَشْطًا
Verse Translation: And [by] those who remove with ease

Verse Text: وَالسَّابِحَاتِ سَبْحًا
Verse Translation: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming

Verse Text: فَالسَّابِقَاتِ سَبْقًا
Verse Translation: And those who race each other in a race

Verse Text: فَالْمُدَبِّرَاتِ أَمْرًا
Verse Translation: And those who arrange [each] matter,

Verse Text: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الرَّاجِفَةُ
Verse Translation: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],

Verse Text: تَتْبَعُهَا الرَّادِفَةُ
Verse Translation: There will follow it the subsequent [one].

Verse Text: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
Verse Translation: Hearts, that Day, will tremble,

Verse Text: أَبْصَارُهَا خَاشِعَةٌ
Verse Translation: Their eyes humbled.

Verse Text: يَقُولُونَ أَإِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِي الْحَافِرَةِ
Verse Translation: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]?

Verse Text: أَإِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا نَخِرَةً
Verse Translation: Even if we should be decayed bones?

Verse Text: قَالُوا تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
Verse Translation: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."

Verse Text: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed, it will be but one shout,

Verse Text: فَإِذَا هُمْ بِالسَّاهِرَةِ
Verse Translation: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.

Verse Text: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَى
Verse Translation: Has there reached you the story of Moses? -

Verse Text: إِذْ نَادَاهُ رَبُّهُ بِالْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
Verse Translation: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,

Verse Text: اذْهَبْ إِلَى فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُ طَغَى
Verse Translation: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.

Verse Text: فَقُلْ هَلْ لَكَ إِلَى أَنْ تَزَكَّى
Verse Translation: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself

Verse Text: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَى رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَى
Verse Translation: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"

Verse Text: فَأَرَاهُ الْآيَةَ الْكُبْرَى
Verse Translation: And he showed him the greatest sign,

Verse Text: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَى
Verse Translation: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَى
Verse Translation: Then he turned his back, striving.

Verse Text: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَى
Verse Translation: And he gathered [his people] and called out

Verse Text: فَقَالَ أَنَا رَبُّكُمُ الْأَعْلَى
Verse Translation: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."

Verse Text: فَأَخَذَهُ اللَّهُ نَكَالَ الْآخِرَةِ وَالْأُولَى
Verse Translation: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression].

Verse Text: إِنَّ فِي ذَلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِمَنْ يَخْشَى
Verse Translation: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah].

Verse Text: أَأَنْتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ السَّمَاءُ بَنَاهَا
Verse Translation: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.

Verse Text: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّاهَا
Verse Translation: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.

Verse Text: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَاهَا
Verse Translation: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.

Verse Text: وَالْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَلِكَ دَحَاهَا
Verse Translation: And after that He spread the earth.

Verse Text: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَاءَهَا وَمَرْعَاهَا
Verse Translation: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,

Verse Text: وَالْجِبَالَ أَرْسَاهَا
Verse Translation: And the mountains He set firmly

Verse Text: مَتَاعًا لَكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
Verse Translation: As provision for you and your grazing livestock.

Verse Text: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الطَّامَّةُ الْكُبْرَى
Verse Translation: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -

Verse Text: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنْسَانُ مَا سَعَى
Verse Translation: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,

Verse Text: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِمَنْ يَرَى
Verse Translation: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -

Verse Text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ طَغَى
Verse Translation: So as for he who transgressed

Verse Text: وَآثَرَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
Verse Translation: And preferred the life of the world,

Verse Text: فَإِنَّ الْجَحِيمَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَى
Verse Translation: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.

Verse Text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَى
Verse Translation: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,

Verse Text: فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَى
Verse Translation: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.

Verse Text: يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَاهَا
Verse Translation: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?

Verse Text: فِيمَ أَنْتَ مِنْ ذِكْرَاهَا
Verse Translation: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?

Verse Text: إِلَى رَبِّكَ مُنْتَهَاهَا
Verse Translation: To your Lord is its finality.

Verse Text: إِنَّمَا أَنْتَ مُنْذِرُ مَنْ يَخْشَاهَا
Verse Translation: You are only a warner for those who fear it.

Verse Text: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
Verse Translation: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.

Verse Text: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّى
Verse Translation: The Prophet frowned and turned away

Verse Text: أَنْ جَاءَهُ الْأَعْمَى
Verse Translation: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].

Verse Text: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكَّى
Verse Translation: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified

Verse Text: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنْفَعَهُ الذِّكْرَى
Verse Translation: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?

Verse Text: أَمَّا مَنِ اسْتَغْنَى
Verse Translation: As for he who thinks himself without need,

Verse Text: فَأَنْتَ لَهُ تَصَدَّى
Verse Translation: To him you give attention.

Verse Text: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّى
Verse Translation: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.

Verse Text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ جَاءَكَ يَسْعَى
Verse Translation: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]

Verse Text: وَهُوَ يَخْشَى
Verse Translation: While he fears [Allah],

Verse Text: فَأَنْتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّى
Verse Translation: From him you are distracted.

Verse Text: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
Verse Translation: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;

Verse Text: فَمَنْ شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
Verse Translation: So whoever wills may remember it.

Verse Text: فِي صُحُفٍ مُكَرَّمَةٍ
Verse Translation: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,

Verse Text: مَرْفُوعَةٍ مُطَهَّرَةٍ
Verse Translation: Exalted and purified,

Verse Text: بِأَيْدِي سَفَرَةٍ
Verse Translation: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,

Verse Text: كِرَامٍ بَرَرَةٍ
Verse Translation: Noble and dutiful.

Verse Text: قُتِلَ الْإِنْسَانُ مَا أَكْفَرَهُ
Verse Translation: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.

Verse Text: مِنْ أَيِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقَهُ
Verse Translation: From what substance did He create him?

Verse Text: مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ
Verse Translation: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;

Verse Text: ثُمَّ السَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُ
Verse Translation: Then He eased the way for him;

Verse Text: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُ فَأَقْبَرَهُ
Verse Translation: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاءَ أَنْشَرَهُ
Verse Translation: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.

Verse Text: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَا أَمَرَهُ
Verse Translation: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.

Verse Text: فَلْيَنْظُرِ الْإِنْسَانُ إِلَى طَعَامِهِ
Verse Translation: Then let mankind look at his food -

Verse Text: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا الْمَاءَ صَبًّا
Verse Translation: How We poured down water in torrents,

Verse Text: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا الْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
Verse Translation: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],

Verse Text: فَأَنْبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
Verse Translation: And caused to grow within it grain

Verse Text: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
Verse Translation: And grapes and herbage

Verse Text: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
Verse Translation: And olive and palm trees

Verse Text: وَحَدَائِقَ غُلْبًا
Verse Translation: And gardens of dense shrubbery

Verse Text: وَفَاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
Verse Translation: And fruit and grass -

Verse Text: مَتَاعًا لَكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
Verse Translation: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.

Verse Text: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الصَّاخَّةُ
Verse Translation: But when there comes the Deafening Blast

Verse Text: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
Verse Translation: On the Day a man will flee from his brother

Verse Text: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبِيهِ
Verse Translation: And his mother and his father

Verse Text: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنِيهِ
Verse Translation: And his wife and his children,

Verse Text: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
Verse Translation: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.

Verse Text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُسْفِرَةٌ
Verse Translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -

Verse Text: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
Verse Translation: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.

Verse Text: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
Verse Translation: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.

Verse Text: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
Verse Translation: Blackness will cover them.

Verse Text: أُولَئِكَ هُمُ الْكَفَرَةُ الْفَجَرَةُ
Verse Translation: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.

Verse Text: إِذَا الشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
Verse Translation: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]

Verse Text: وَإِذَا النُّجُومُ انْكَدَرَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the stars fall, dispersing,

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the mountains are removed

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
Verse Translation: And when full-term she-camels are neglected

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the wild beasts are gathered

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the seas are filled with flame

Verse Text: وَإِذَا النُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the souls are paired

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked

Verse Text: بِأَيِّ ذَنْبٍ قُتِلَتْ
Verse Translation: For what sin she was killed

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the pages are made public

Verse Text: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ كُشِطَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the sky is stripped away

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
Verse Translation: And when Hellfire is set ablaze

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
Verse Translation: And when Paradise is brought near,

Verse Text: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَا أَحْضَرَتْ
Verse Translation: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].

Verse Text: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالْخُنَّسِ
Verse Translation: So I swear by the retreating stars -

Verse Text: الْجَوَارِ الْكُنَّسِ
Verse Translation: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -

Verse Text: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
Verse Translation: And by the night as it closes in

Verse Text: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
Verse Translation: And by the dawn when it breathes

Verse Text: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
Verse Translation: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger

Verse Text: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِنْدَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
Verse Translation: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],

Verse Text: مُطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
Verse Translation: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.

Verse Text: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُمْ بِمَجْنُونٍ
Verse Translation: And your companion is not [at all] mad.

Verse Text: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ بِالْأُفُقِ الْمُبِينِ
Verse Translation: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.

Verse Text: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى الْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
Verse Translation: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.

Verse Text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَانٍ رَجِيمٍ
Verse Translation: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].

Verse Text: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
Verse Translation: So where are you going?

Verse Text: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِلْعَالَمِينَ
Verse Translation: It is not except a reminder to the worlds

Verse Text: لِمَنْ شَاءَ مِنْكُمْ أَنْ يَسْتَقِيمَ
Verse Translation: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.

Verse Text: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
Verse Translation: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.

Verse Text: إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انْفَطَرَتْ
Verse Translation: When the sky breaks apart

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الْكَوَاكِبُ انْتَثَرَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the stars fall, scattering,

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the seas are erupted

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
Verse Translation: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,

Verse Text: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
Verse Translation: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنْسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
Verse Translation: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,

Verse Text: الَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
Verse Translation: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?

Verse Text: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
Verse Translation: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.

Verse Text: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ
Verse Translation: No! But you deny the Recompense.

Verse Text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ
Verse Translation: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,

Verse Text: كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ
Verse Translation: Noble and recording;

Verse Text: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
Verse Translation: They know whatever you do.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
Verse Translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,

Verse Text: وَإِنَّ الْفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٍ
Verse Translation: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.

Verse Text: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
Verse Translation: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,

Verse Text: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَائِبِينَ
Verse Translation: And never therefrom will they be absent.

Verse Text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
Verse Translation: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

Verse Text: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
Verse Translation: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

Verse Text: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلَّهِ
Verse Translation: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.

Verse Text: وَيْلٌ لِلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
Verse Translation: Woe to those who give less [than due],

Verse Text: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
Verse Translation: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.

Verse Text: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَوْ وَزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
Verse Translation: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.

Verse Text: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُولَئِكَ أَنَّهُمْ مَبْعُوثُونَ
Verse Translation: Do they not think that they will be resurrected

Verse Text: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
Verse Translation: For a tremendous Day -

Verse Text: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
Verse Translation: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?

Verse Text: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
Verse Translation: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.

Verse Text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
Verse Translation: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?

Verse Text: كِتَابٌ مَرْقُومٌ
Verse Translation: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.

Verse Text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
Verse Translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,

Verse Text: الَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
Verse Translation: Who deny the Day of Recompense.

Verse Text: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
Verse Translation: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.

Verse Text: إِذَا تُتْلَى عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
Verse Translation: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

Verse Text: كَلَّا بَلْ رَانَ عَلَى قُلُوبِهِمْ مَا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
Verse Translation: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.

Verse Text: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَنْ رَبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَمَحْجُوبُونَ
Verse Translation: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُو الْجَحِيمِ
Verse Translation: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَذَا الَّذِي كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
Verse Translation: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."

Verse Text: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
Verse Translation: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.

Verse Text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
Verse Translation: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?

Verse Text: كِتَابٌ مَرْقُومٌ
Verse Translation: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed

Verse Text: يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
Verse Translation: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].

Verse Text: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
Verse Translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure

Verse Text: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنْظُرُونَ
Verse Translation: On adorned couches, observing.

Verse Text: تَعْرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيمِ
Verse Translation: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.

Verse Text: يُسْقَوْنَ مِنْ رَحِيقٍ مَخْتُومٍ
Verse Translation: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.

Verse Text: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ وَفِي ذَلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
Verse Translation: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.

Verse Text: وَمِزَاجُهُ مِنْ تَسْنِيمٍ
Verse Translation: And its mixture is of Tasneem,

Verse Text: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
Verse Translation: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ
Verse Translation: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.

Verse Text: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
Verse Translation: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.

Verse Text: وَإِذَا انْقَلَبُوا إِلَى أَهْلِهِمُ انْقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ
Verse Translation: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.

Verse Text: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ
Verse Translation: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."

Verse Text: وَمَا أُرْسِلُوا عَلَيْهِمْ حَافِظِينَ
Verse Translation: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.

Verse Text: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
Verse Translation: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,

Verse Text: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنْظُرُونَ
Verse Translation: On adorned couches, observing.

Verse Text: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
Verse Translation: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?

Verse Text: إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انْشَقَّتْ
Verse Translation: When the sky has split [open]

Verse Text: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
Verse Translation: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

Verse Text: وَإِذَا الْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
Verse Translation: And when the earth has been extended

Verse Text: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
Verse Translation: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]

Verse Text: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
Verse Translation: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -

Verse Text: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنْسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَى رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
Verse Translation: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.

Verse Text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ
Verse Translation: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,

Verse Text: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
Verse Translation: He will be judged with an easy account

Verse Text: وَيَنْقَلِبُ إِلَى أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
Verse Translation: And return to his people in happiness.

Verse Text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
Verse Translation: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,

Verse Text: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُو ثُبُورًا
Verse Translation: He will cry out for destruction

Verse Text: وَيَصْلَى سَعِيرًا
Verse Translation: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.

Verse Text: إِنَّهُ كَانَ فِي أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;

Verse Text: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَنْ لَنْ يَحُورَ
Verse Translation: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].

Verse Text: بَلَى إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
Verse Translation: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.

Verse Text: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
Verse Translation: So I swear by the twilight glow

Verse Text: وَاللَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
Verse Translation: And [by] the night and what it envelops

Verse Text: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ
Verse Translation: And [by] the moon when it becomes full

Verse Text: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَنْ طَبَقٍ
Verse Translation: [That] you will surely experience state after state.

Verse Text: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
Verse Translation: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,

Verse Text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ
Verse Translation: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?

Verse Text: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يُكَذِّبُونَ
Verse Translation: But those who have disbelieved deny,

Verse Text: وَاللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
Verse Translation: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.

Verse Text: فَبَشِّرْهُمْ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
Verse Translation: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,

Verse Text: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
Verse Translation: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.

Verse Text: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوجِ
Verse Translation: By the sky containing great stars

Verse Text: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُودِ
Verse Translation: And [by] the promised Day

Verse Text: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
Verse Translation: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,

Verse Text: قُتِلَ أَصْحَابُ الْأُخْدُودِ
Verse Translation: Cursed were the companions of the trench

Verse Text: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُودِ
Verse Translation: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,

Verse Text: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
Verse Translation: When they were sitting near it

Verse Text: وَهُمْ عَلَى مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
Verse Translation: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.

Verse Text: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَنْ يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
Verse Translation: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,

Verse Text: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَاللَّهُ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
Verse Translation: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
Verse Translation: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ذَلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
Verse Translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.

Verse Text: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.

Verse Text: إِنَّهُ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
Verse Translation: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.

Verse Text: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ
Verse Translation: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,

Verse Text: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيدُ
Verse Translation: Honorable Owner of the Throne,

Verse Text: فَعَّالٌ لِمَا يُرِيدُ
Verse Translation: Effecter of what He intends.

Verse Text: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْجُنُودِ
Verse Translation: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -

Verse Text: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
Verse Translation: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?

Verse Text: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي تَكْذِيبٍ
Verse Translation: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,

Verse Text: وَاللَّهُ مِنْ وَرَائِهِمْ مُحِيطٌ
Verse Translation: While Allah encompasses them from behind.

Verse Text: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْآنٌ مَجِيدٌ
Verse Translation: But this is an honored Qur'an

Verse Text: فِي لَوْحٍ مَحْفُوظٍ
Verse Translation: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.

Verse Text: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَالطَّارِقِ
Verse Translation: By the sky and the night comer -

Verse Text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الطَّارِقُ
Verse Translation: And what can make you know what is the night comer?

Verse Text: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُ
Verse Translation: It is the piercing star -

Verse Text: إِنْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
Verse Translation: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.

Verse Text: فَلْيَنْظُرِ الْإِنْسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
Verse Translation: So let man observe from what he was created.

Verse Text: خُلِقَ مِنْ مَاءٍ دَافِقٍ
Verse Translation: He was created from a fluid, ejected,

Verse Text: يَخْرُجُ مِنْ بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ
Verse Translation: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.

Verse Text: إِنَّهُ عَلَى رَجْعِهِ لَقَادِرٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.

Verse Text: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ
Verse Translation: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,

Verse Text: فَمَا لَهُ مِنْ قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
Verse Translation: Then man will have no power or any helper.

Verse Text: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِ
Verse Translation: By the sky which returns [rain]

Verse Text: وَالْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِ
Verse Translation: And [by] the earth which cracks open,

Verse Text: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,

Verse Text: وَمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِ
Verse Translation: And it is not amusement.

Verse Text: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, they are planning a plan,

Verse Text: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
Verse Translation: But I am planning a plan.

Verse Text: فَمَهِّلِ الْكَافِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا
Verse Translation: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.

Verse Text: سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلَى
Verse Translation: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,

Verse Text: الَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّى
Verse Translation: Who created and proportioned

Verse Text: وَالَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَى
Verse Translation: And who destined and [then] guided

Verse Text: وَالَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعَى
Verse Translation: And who brings out the pasture

Verse Text: فَجَعَلَهُ غُثَاءً أَحْوَى
Verse Translation: And [then] makes it black stubble.

Verse Text: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنْسَى
Verse Translation: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,

Verse Text: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَى
Verse Translation: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.

Verse Text: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَى
Verse Translation: And We will ease you toward ease.

Verse Text: فَذَكِّرْ إِنْ نَفَعَتِ الذِّكْرَى
Verse Translation: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;

Verse Text: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَنْ يَخْشَى
Verse Translation: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.

Verse Text: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا الْأَشْقَى
Verse Translation: But the wretched one will avoid it -

Verse Text: الَّذِي يَصْلَى النَّارَ الْكُبْرَى
Verse Translation: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,

Verse Text: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَى
Verse Translation: Neither dying therein nor living.

Verse Text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَنْ تَزَكَّى
Verse Translation: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself

Verse Text: وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهِ فَصَلَّى
Verse Translation: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.

Verse Text: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
Verse Translation: But you prefer the worldly life,

Verse Text: وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَى
Verse Translation: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.

Verse Text: إِنَّ هَذَا لَفِي الصُّحُفِ الْأُولَى
Verse Translation: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,

Verse Text: صُحُفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَمُوسَى
Verse Translation: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

Verse Text: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْغَاشِيَةِ
Verse Translation: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?

Verse Text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَاشِعَةٌ
Verse Translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,

Verse Text: عَامِلَةٌ نَاصِبَةٌ
Verse Translation: Working [hard] and exhausted.

Verse Text: تَصْلَى نَارًا حَامِيَةً
Verse Translation: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.

Verse Text: تُسْقَى مِنْ عَيْنٍ آنِيَةٍ
Verse Translation: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.

Verse Text: لَيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنْ ضَرِيعٍ
Verse Translation: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant

Verse Text: لَا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنْ جُوعٍ
Verse Translation: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.

Verse Text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَاعِمَةٌ
Verse Translation: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.

Verse Text: لِسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
Verse Translation: With their effort [they are] satisfied

Verse Text: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
Verse Translation: In an elevated garden,

Verse Text: لَا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَاغِيَةً
Verse Translation: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.

Verse Text: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
Verse Translation: Within it is a flowing spring.

Verse Text: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَرْفُوعَةٌ
Verse Translation: Within it are couches raised high

Verse Text: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَوْضُوعَةٌ
Verse Translation: And cups put in place

Verse Text: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
Verse Translation: And cushions lined up

Verse Text: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
Verse Translation: And carpets spread around.

Verse Text: أَفَلَا يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
Verse Translation: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?

Verse Text: وَإِلَى السَّمَاءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
Verse Translation: And at the sky - how it is raised?

Verse Text: وَإِلَى الْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
Verse Translation: And at the mountains - how they are erected?

Verse Text: وَإِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
Verse Translation: And at the earth - how it is spread out?

Verse Text: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَا أَنْتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
Verse Translation: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.

Verse Text: لَسْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
Verse Translation: You are not over them a controller.

Verse Text: إِلَّا مَنْ تَوَلَّى وَكَفَرَ
Verse Translation: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -

Verse Text: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اللَّهُ الْعَذَابَ الْأَكْبَرَ
Verse Translation: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.

Verse Text: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَا إِيَابَهُمْ
Verse Translation: Indeed, to Us is their return.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُمْ
Verse Translation: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.

Verse Text: وَالْفَجْرِ
Verse Translation: By the dawn

Verse Text: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
Verse Translation: And [by] ten nights

Verse Text: وَالشَّفْعِ وَالْوَتْرِ
Verse Translation: And [by] the even [number] and the odd

Verse Text: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
Verse Translation: And [by] the night when it passes,

Verse Text: هَلْ فِي ذَلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِذِي حِجْرٍ
Verse Translation: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?

Verse Text: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
Verse Translation: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -

Verse Text: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ الْعِمَادِ
Verse Translation: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,

Verse Text: الَّتِي لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِي الْبِلَادِ
Verse Translation: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?

Verse Text: وَثَمُودَ الَّذِينَ جَابُوا الصَّخْرَ بِالْوَادِ
Verse Translation: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?

Verse Text: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِي الْأَوْتَادِ
Verse Translation: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -

Verse Text: الَّذِينَ طَغَوْا فِي الْبِلَادِ
Verse Translation: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands

Verse Text: فَأَكْثَرُوا فِيهَا الْفَسَادَ
Verse Translation: And increased therein the corruption.

Verse Text: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
Verse Translation: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.

Verse Text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالْمِرْصَادِ
Verse Translation: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.

Verse Text: فَأَمَّا الْإِنْسَانُ إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَأَكْرَمَهُ وَنَعَّمَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَكْرَمَنِ
Verse Translation: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."

Verse Text: وَأَمَّا إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَهَانَنِ
Verse Translation: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."

Verse Text: كَلَّا بَلْ لَا تُكْرِمُونَ الْيَتِيمَ
Verse Translation: No! But you do not honor the orphan

Verse Text: وَلَا تَحَاضُّونَ عَلَى طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
Verse Translation: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.

Verse Text: وَتَأْكُلُونَ التُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَمًّا
Verse Translation: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,

Verse Text: وَتُحِبُّونَ الْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
Verse Translation: And you love wealth with immense love.

Verse Text: كَلَّا إِذَا دُكَّتِ الْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
Verse Translation: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -

Verse Text: وَجَاءَ رَبُّكَ وَالْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
Verse Translation: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,

Verse Text: وَجِيءَ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِجَهَنَّمَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنْسَانُ وَأَنَّى لَهُ الذِّكْرَى
Verse Translation: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?

Verse Text: يَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِي
Verse Translation: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."

Verse Text: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُ أَحَدٌ
Verse Translation: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,

Verse Text: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُ أَحَدٌ
Verse Translation: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].

Verse Text: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
Verse Translation: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,

Verse Text: ارْجِعِي إِلَى رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَرْضِيَّةً
Verse Translation: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],

Verse Text: فَادْخُلِي فِي عِبَادِي
Verse Translation: And enter among My [righteous] servants

Verse Text: وَادْخُلِي جَنَّتِي
Verse Translation: And enter My Paradise."

Verse Text: لَا أُقْسِمُ بِهَذَا الْبَلَدِ
Verse Translation: I swear by this city, Makkah -

Verse Text: وَأَنْتَ حِلٌّ بِهَذَا الْبَلَدِ
Verse Translation: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -

Verse Text: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
Verse Translation: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],

Verse Text: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ
Verse Translation: We have certainly created man into hardship.

Verse Text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَنْ لَنْ يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
Verse Translation: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?

Verse Text: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُبَدًا
Verse Translation: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."

Verse Text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَنْ لَمْ يَرَهُ أَحَدٌ
Verse Translation: Does he think that no one has seen him?

Verse Text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلْ لَهُ عَيْنَيْنِ
Verse Translation: Have We not made for him two eyes?

Verse Text: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
Verse Translation: And a tongue and two lips?

Verse Text: وَهَدَيْنَاهُ النَّجْدَيْنِ
Verse Translation: And have shown him the two ways?

Verse Text: فَلَا اقْتَحَمَ الْعَقَبَةَ
Verse Translation: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.

Verse Text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْعَقَبَةُ
Verse Translation: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?

Verse Text: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
Verse Translation: It is the freeing of a slave

Verse Text: أَوْ إِطْعَامٌ فِي يَوْمٍ ذِي مَسْغَبَةٍ
Verse Translation: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger

Verse Text: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
Verse Translation: An orphan of near relationship

Verse Text: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
Verse Translation: Or a needy person in misery

Verse Text: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِ
Verse Translation: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.

Verse Text: أُولَئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
Verse Translation: Those are the companions of the right.

Verse Text: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
Verse Translation: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.

Verse Text: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُؤْصَدَةٌ
Verse Translation: Over them will be fire closed in.

Verse Text: وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا
Verse Translation: By the sun and its brightness

Verse Text: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَاهَا
Verse Translation: And [by] the moon when it follows it

Verse Text: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّاهَا
Verse Translation: And [by] the day when it displays it

Verse Text: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَاهَا
Verse Translation: And [by] the night when it covers it

Verse Text: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَمَا بَنَاهَا
Verse Translation: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it

Verse Text: وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا
Verse Translation: And [by] the earth and He who spread it

Verse Text: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّاهَا
Verse Translation: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it

Verse Text: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَاهَا
Verse Translation: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,

Verse Text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَنْ زَكَّاهَا
Verse Translation: He has succeeded who purifies it,

Verse Text: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنْ دَسَّاهَا
Verse Translation: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].

Verse Text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَاهَا
Verse Translation: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,

Verse Text: إِذِ انْبَعَثَ أَشْقَاهَا
Verse Translation: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.

Verse Text: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
Verse Translation: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."

Verse Text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ بِذَنْبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
Verse Translation: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].

Verse Text: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَاهَا
Verse Translation: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.

Verse Text: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَى
Verse Translation: By the night when it covers

Verse Text: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّى
Verse Translation: And [by] the day when it appears

Verse Text: وَمَا خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنْثَى
Verse Translation: And [by] He who created the male and female,

Verse Text: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّى
Verse Translation: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.

Verse Text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَى وَاتَّقَى
Verse Translation: As for he who gives and fears Allah

Verse Text: وَصَدَّقَ بِالْحُسْنَى
Verse Translation: And believes in the best [reward],

Verse Text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْيُسْرَى
Verse Translation: We will ease him toward ease.

Verse Text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ بَخِلَ وَاسْتَغْنَى
Verse Translation: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need

Verse Text: وَكَذَّبَ بِالْحُسْنَى
Verse Translation: And denies the best [reward],

Verse Text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْعُسْرَى
Verse Translation: We will ease him toward difficulty.

Verse Text: وَمَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُ مَالُهُ إِذَا تَرَدَّى
Verse Translation: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?

Verse Text: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَى
Verse Translation: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.

Verse Text: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْآخِرَةَ وَالْأُولَى
Verse Translation: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

Verse Text: فَأَنْذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّى
Verse Translation: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.

Verse Text: لَا يَصْلَاهَا إِلَّا الْأَشْقَى
Verse Translation: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.

Verse Text: الَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّى
Verse Translation: Who had denied and turned away.

Verse Text: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الْأَتْقَى
Verse Translation: But the righteous one will avoid it -

Verse Text: الَّذِي يُؤْتِي مَالَهُ يَتَزَكَّى
Verse Translation: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself

Verse Text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِنْدَهُ مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ تُجْزَى
Verse Translation: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded

Verse Text: إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ الْأَعْلَى
Verse Translation: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.

Verse Text: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَى
Verse Translation: And he is going to be satisfied.

Verse Text: وَالضُّحَى
Verse Translation: By the morning brightness

Verse Text: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَى
Verse Translation: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,

Verse Text: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَى
Verse Translation: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].

Verse Text: وَلَلْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَكَ مِنَ الْأُولَى
Verse Translation: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].

Verse Text: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَى
Verse Translation: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.

Verse Text: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَآوَى
Verse Translation: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?

Verse Text: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَالًّا فَهَدَى
Verse Translation: And He found you lost and guided [you],

Verse Text: وَوَجَدَكَ عَائِلًا فَأَغْنَى
Verse Translation: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.

Verse Text: فَأَمَّا الْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
Verse Translation: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].

Verse Text: وَأَمَّا السَّائِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
Verse Translation: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].

Verse Text: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
Verse Translation: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].

Verse Text: أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
Verse Translation: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?

Verse Text: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنْكَ وِزْرَكَ
Verse Translation: And We removed from you your burden

Verse Text: الَّذِي أَنْقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
Verse Translation: Which had weighed upon your back

Verse Text: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
Verse Translation: And raised high for you your repute.

Verse Text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
Verse Translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

Verse Text: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
Verse Translation: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

Verse Text: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانْصَبْ
Verse Translation: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].

Verse Text: وَإِلَى رَبِّكَ فَارْغَبْ
Verse Translation: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.

Verse Text: وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ
Verse Translation: By the fig and the olive

Verse Text: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
Verse Translation: And [by] Mount Sinai

Verse Text: وَهَذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِينِ
Verse Translation: And [by] this secure city [Makkah],

Verse Text: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
Verse Translation: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;

Verse Text: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَاهُ أَسْفَلَ سَافِلِينَ
Verse Translation: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,

Verse Text: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
Verse Translation: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.

Verse Text: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّينِ
Verse Translation: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?

Verse Text: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحَاكِمِينَ
Verse Translation: Is not Allah the most just of judges?

Verse Text: اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
Verse Translation: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -

Verse Text: خَلَقَ الْإِنْسَانَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
Verse Translation: Created man from a clinging substance.

Verse Text: اقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ الْأَكْرَمُ
Verse Translation: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -

Verse Text: الَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِ
Verse Translation: Who taught by the pen -

Verse Text: عَلَّمَ الْإِنْسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
Verse Translation: Taught man that which he knew not.

Verse Text: كَلَّا إِنَّ الْإِنْسَانَ لَيَطْغَى
Verse Translation: No! [But] indeed, man transgresses

Verse Text: أَنْ رَآهُ اسْتَغْنَى
Verse Translation: Because he sees himself self-sufficient.

Verse Text: إِنَّ إِلَى رَبِّكَ الرُّجْعَى
Verse Translation: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.

Verse Text: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يَنْهَى
Verse Translation: Have you seen the one who forbids

Verse Text: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّى
Verse Translation: A servant when he prays?

Verse Text: أَرَأَيْتَ إِنْ كَانَ عَلَى الْهُدَى
Verse Translation: Have you seen if he is upon guidance

Verse Text: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِالتَّقْوَى
Verse Translation: Or enjoins righteousness?

Verse Text: أَرَأَيْتَ إِنْ كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّى
Verse Translation: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -

Verse Text: أَلَمْ يَعْلَمْ بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَرَى
Verse Translation: Does he not know that Allah sees?

Verse Text: كَلَّا لَئِنْ لَمْ يَنْتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ
Verse Translation: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -

Verse Text: نَاصِيَةٍ كَاذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
Verse Translation: A lying, sinning forelock.

Verse Text: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُ
Verse Translation: Then let him call his associates;

Verse Text: سَنَدْعُ الزَّبَانِيَةَ
Verse Translation: We will call the angels of Hell.

Verse Text: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَاسْجُدْ وَاقْتَرِبْ
Verse Translation: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].

Verse Text: إِنَّا أَنْزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
Verse Translation: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.

Verse Text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ
Verse Translation: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

Verse Text: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
Verse Translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

Verse Text: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِمْ مِنْ كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
Verse Translation: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.

Verse Text: سَلَامٌ هِيَ حَتَّى مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ
Verse Translation: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.

Verse Text: لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنْفَكِّينَ حَتَّى تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
Verse Translation: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence -

Verse Text: رَسُولٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُطَهَّرَةً
Verse Translation: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures

Verse Text: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
Verse Translation: Within which are correct writings.

Verse Text: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
Verse Translation: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence.

Verse Text: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَذَلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ
Verse Translation: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أُولَئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
Verse Translation: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.

Verse Text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
Verse Translation: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.

Verse Text: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ذَلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
Verse Translation: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.

Verse Text: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
Verse Translation: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake

Verse Text: وَأَخْرَجَتِ الْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
Verse Translation: And the earth discharges its burdens

Verse Text: وَقَالَ الْإِنْسَانُ مَا لَهَا
Verse Translation: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -

Verse Text: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
Verse Translation: That Day, it will report its news

Verse Text: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَى لَهَا
Verse Translation: Because your Lord has commanded it.

Verse Text: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
Verse Translation: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.

Verse Text: فَمَنْ يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
Verse Translation: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,

Verse Text: وَمَنْ يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
Verse Translation: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.

Verse Text: وَالْعَادِيَاتِ ضَبْحًا
Verse Translation: By the racers, panting,

Verse Text: فَالْمُورِيَاتِ قَدْحًا
Verse Translation: And the producers of sparks [when] striking

Verse Text: فَالْمُغِيرَاتِ صُبْحًا
Verse Translation: And the chargers at dawn,

Verse Text: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِ نَقْعًا
Verse Translation: Stirring up thereby [clouds of] dust,

Verse Text: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِ جَمْعًا
Verse Translation: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,

Verse Text: إِنَّ الْإِنْسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.

Verse Text: وَإِنَّهُ عَلَى ذَلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
Verse Translation: And indeed, he is to that a witness.

Verse Text: وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
Verse Translation: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.

Verse Text: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ
Verse Translation: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered

Verse Text: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي الصُّدُورِ
Verse Translation: And that within the breasts is obtained,

Verse Text: إِنَّ رَبَّهُمْ بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَخَبِيرٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.

Verse Text: الْقَارِعَةُ
Verse Translation: The Striking Calamity -

Verse Text: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
Verse Translation: What is the Striking Calamity?

Verse Text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
Verse Translation: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?

Verse Text: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ النَّاسُ كَالْفَرَاشِ الْمَبْثُوثِ
Verse Translation: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,

Verse Text: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ الْمَنْفُوشِ
Verse Translation: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.

Verse Text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
Verse Translation: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],

Verse Text: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَاضِيَةٍ
Verse Translation: He will be in a pleasant life.

Verse Text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
Verse Translation: But as for one whose scales are light,

Verse Text: فَأُمُّهُ هَاوِيَةٌ
Verse Translation: His refuge will be an abyss.

Verse Text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا هِيَهْ
Verse Translation: And what can make you know what that is?

Verse Text: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌ
Verse Translation: It is a Fire, intensely hot.

Verse Text: أَلْهَاكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُ
Verse Translation: Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you

Verse Text: حَتَّى زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَ
Verse Translation: Until you visit the graveyards.

Verse Text: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
Verse Translation: No! You are going to know.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
Verse Translation: Then no! You are going to know.

Verse Text: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ
Verse Translation: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...

Verse Text: لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيمَ
Verse Translation: You will surely see the Hellfire.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ الْيَقِينِ
Verse Translation: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.

Verse Text: ثُمَّ لَتُسْأَلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيمِ
Verse Translation: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.

Verse Text: وَالْعَصْرِ
Verse Translation: By time,

Verse Text: إِنَّ الْإِنْسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
Verse Translation: Indeed, mankind is in loss,

Verse Text: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
Verse Translation: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.

Verse Text: وَيْلٌ لِكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُمَزَةٍ
Verse Translation: Woe to every scorner and mocker

Verse Text: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
Verse Translation: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.

Verse Text: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُ أَخْلَدَهُ
Verse Translation: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.

Verse Text: كَلَّا لَيُنْبَذَنَّ فِي الْحُطَمَةِ
Verse Translation: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.

Verse Text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحُطَمَةُ
Verse Translation: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?

Verse Text: نَارُ اللَّهِ الْمُوقَدَةُ
Verse Translation: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,

Verse Text: الَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الْأَفْئِدَةِ
Verse Translation: Which mounts directed at the hearts.

Verse Text: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِمْ مُؤْصَدَةٌ
Verse Translation: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them

Verse Text: فِي عَمَدٍ مُمَدَّدَةٍ
Verse Translation: In extended columns.

Verse Text: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
Verse Translation: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?

Verse Text: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِي تَضْلِيلٍ
Verse Translation: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?

Verse Text: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
Verse Translation: And He sent against them birds in flocks,

Verse Text: تَرْمِيهِمْ بِحِجَارَةٍ مِنْ سِجِّيلٍ
Verse Translation: Striking them with stones of hard clay,

Verse Text: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَأْكُولٍ
Verse Translation: And He made them like eaten straw.

Verse Text: لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ
Verse Translation: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -

Verse Text: إِيلَافِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَاءِ وَالصَّيْفِ
Verse Translation: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -

Verse Text: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا رَبَّ هَذَا الْبَيْتِ
Verse Translation: Let them worship the Lord of this House,

Verse Text: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُمْ مِنْ جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُمْ مِنْ خَوْفٍ
Verse Translation: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.

Verse Text: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّينِ
Verse Translation: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?

Verse Text: فَذَلِكَ الَّذِي يَدُعُّ الْيَتِيمَ
Verse Translation: For that is the one who drives away the orphan

Verse Text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَى طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
Verse Translation: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

Verse Text: فَوَيْلٌ لِلْمُصَلِّينَ
Verse Translation: So woe to those who pray

Verse Text: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَنْ صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
Verse Translation: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -

Verse Text: الَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَاءُونَ
Verse Translation: Those who make show [of their deeds]

Verse Text: وَيَمْنَعُونَ الْمَاعُونَ
Verse Translation: And withhold [simple] assistance.

Verse Text: إِنَّا أَعْطَيْنَاكَ الْكَوْثَرَ
Verse Translation: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.

Verse Text: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْ
Verse Translation: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].

Verse Text: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْأَبْتَرُ
Verse Translation: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.

Verse Text: قُلْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْكَافِرُونَ
Verse Translation: Say, "O disbelievers,

Verse Text: لَا أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
Verse Translation: I do not worship what you worship.

Verse Text: وَلَا أَنْتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
Verse Translation: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.

Verse Text: وَلَا أَنَا عَابِدٌ مَا عَبَدْتُمْ
Verse Translation: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.

Verse Text: وَلَا أَنْتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
Verse Translation: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.

Verse Text: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ
Verse Translation: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."

Verse Text: إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ
Verse Translation: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,

Verse Text: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
Verse Translation: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,

Verse Text: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
Verse Translation: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.

Verse Text: تَبَّتْ يَدَا أَبِي لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
Verse Translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

Verse Text: مَا أَغْنَى عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
Verse Translation: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.

Verse Text: سَيَصْلَى نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
Verse Translation: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame

Verse Text: وَامْرَأَتُهُ حَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِ
Verse Translation: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.

Verse Text: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِنْ مَسَدٍ
Verse Translation: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.

Verse Text: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
Verse Translation: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,

Verse Text: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
Verse Translation: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.

Verse Text: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
Verse Translation: He neither begets nor is born,

Verse Text: وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
Verse Translation: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."

Verse Text: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ
Verse Translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak

Verse Text: مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
Verse Translation: From the evil of that which He created

Verse Text: وَمِنْ شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
Verse Translation: And from the evil of darkness when it settles

Verse Text: وَمِنْ شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ
Verse Translation: And from the evil of the blowers in knots

Verse Text: وَمِنْ شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
Verse Translation: And from the evil of an envier when he envies."

Verse Text: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
Verse Translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,

Verse Text: مَلِكِ النَّاسِ
Verse Translation: The Sovereign of mankind.

Verse Text: إِلَهِ النَّاسِ
Verse Translation: The God of mankind,

Verse Text: مِنْ شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ
Verse Translation: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -

Verse Text: الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ
Verse Translation: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -

Verse Text: مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
Verse Translation: From among the jinn and mankind."
